column4: Stayed 5 nights. Welcoming staff, large peaceful central garden and pool area. Mustafa and Hicham looked after us well at breakfast time. Also Marcelona restaurant very good ate there twice.Hotel in a decent location, handy for station and airport. Walkable distance to Medina at winter temperatures otherwise an easy and short taxi ride

A very beautiful hotel. I recommend this place, which gave us a beautiful energy My wife and I want to thank naima in the restaurant breakfast saray the girl Fatimaezzahra guest relation who made us happy in the hotel and we met by chance in a market and she helped us inside and outside the hotel. Thank you

column3: An oasis palace with authentically friendly & professional staff
column4: Such a beautiful oasis -- gorgeous colors in the large pool, beautiful tropical gardens, real actual art by artists not by hotel suppliers, interesting nooks, Moroccan designs, gorgeous gift shops, all a delight to the artistic eye. Best international breakfast with everything imaginable, energizing fitness classes you can join randomly for joy, and Ahmed, serving mint tea by a blue tiled pool among antiques, tropical leaves, bird cages to set a bit before launching into the city. The staff seemed authentic and we enjoyed seeing them have the freedom to celebrate the advances of Morocco in the World Cup, and felt like we were in a palace.

I love this hotel! It s the 2nd time in 2022, we stay with our group at this Hotel, (Daycoval grp, from Brasil) and I can tell you: our group is a big one! In April 2022 with more than 200 guests, now in November around 90 guests. The staff is amazing, beginning at front desk with all of them, and specially Mr Souhail, also the cleaning ladies Sana and Noura - femme de chambres, incredible nice and gentle. Everybody at the restaurant, the Chef at breakfast, Miss Fatima, so so sweet, always keeping a table for me and when I had no time for breakfast as we are always running, she arranged for me a little something to eat, a croissant, an yogurt, anything. So, for sure, next time in Marrakech, I ll stay there, even privaste with my family. Rooms and beds and showers are great too.‚Ä¶

column3: Managers are Rude! Room pictures are deceiving!
column4: The hotel managers are rude and will not accommodate you. The pictures of the rooms are not what the rooms are. They won‚Äôt provide good bedding and the hotel felt dirty. I do not recommend staying here. Calling it a 5 star hotel is a lie. They should be ashamed to call themselves luxurious

Large French hotel with all the facilities you expect from a 5 star but no real soul. Sadly whilst the grounds and facilities are all you would expect the service leaves alot to be desired. Restuarant/ Bar staff appear miserable and unfriendly and slow to meet the needs of guests. Generally you are waiting around for someone to serve you and you are made to feel it's a hassle. Disorganised approach in restaurants and bar. On arrival we were given no information of facilities and restaurants etc and even getting a menu was impossible unless you have a smart phone. Selection of food in buffet poor given the apparent 5* standard of the hotel and not a great reflection on Moroccan hospitality. Housekeeping was good and standards v clean. Entertainment was very overpriced and a‚Ä¶

column3: Fantastic hotel with a great housekeeping team
column4: Great hotel with very spacious an comfortable rooms. Very clean and well appointed rooms made very comfortable and special by the manager Inane and the housekeeper Sidi Hida. Excellent breakfast + 5* facilities and spa is also a great space for a relaxing experience.

Had a great day at this amazing Hotel, too bad i didn t stay in for long but i am sure that it will be my stay whenever i come back to that beautiful city,the place is amazing for good pictures and they have very cool and supportive team , and special thanks to Mustapha the barman he was so kind and very helpful special thanks to him , he was the best thanks to him and all the team
We had excellent service at Movenpick hotel especially Ropia and Khadija were extremely helpful and went above and beyond their duty. Thank you Ropia and Khadija for making my stay more comfortable.

The Movenpick hotel made our family vacation in Morocco, one to remember. It all started with Nehza, the receptionist who greeted us warmly, was eager to check us in and gave us recommendations on what to do in Marrakesh. The hotel grounds and the rooms are beautiful and well maintained. The ladies, Salma, Najat,Mina and the young man Yassine, kept our room clean and replenished every single day of our 7 nights stay. The breakfast buffet is one of the best I have seen in a hotel. What makes breakfast even better is the staff, Mustapha and his son Mohamed, Youness, Hdija, Sami, Nizar and Mariam are all people we became familiar with within the 8 days we stayed at the hotel. Every single day, they were happy to see us and hurriedly assisted us. Thank you all for your service. ‚Ä¶

Stayed 5 nights. Welcoming staff, large peaceful central garden and pool area. Mustafa and Hicham looked after us well at breakfast time. Also Marcelona restaurant very good ate there twice.Hotel in a decent location, handy for station and airport. Walkable distance to Medina at winter temperatures otherwise an easy and short taxi ride

A very beautiful hotel. I recommend this place, which gave us a beautiful energy My wife and I want to thank naima in the restaurant breakfast saray the girl Fatimaezzahra guest relation who made us happy in the hotel and we met by chance in a market and she helped us inside and outside the hotel. Thank you

So, for sure, next time in Marrakech, I ll stay there, even privaste with my family. Rooms and beds and showers are great too.‚Ä¶

I do not recommend staying here. Calling it a 5 star hotel is a lie. They should be ashamed to call themselves luxurious

Selection of food in buffet poor given the apparent 5* standard of the hotel and not a great reflection on Moroccan hospitality. Housekeeping was good and standards v clean. Entertainment was very overpriced and a‚Ä¶

column4: Great hotel with very spacious an comfortable rooms. Very clean and well appointed rooms made very comfortable and special by the manager Inane and the housekeeper Sidi Hida. Excellent breakfast + 5* facilities and spa is also a great space for a relaxing experience.

Had a great day at this amazing Hotel, too bad i didn t stay in for long but i am sure that it will be my stay whenever i come back to that beautiful city,the place is amazing for good pictures and they have very cool and supportive team , and special thanks to Mustapha the barman he was so kind and very helpful special thanks to him , he was the best thanks to him and all the team
We had excellent service at Movenpick hotel especially Ropia and Khadija were extremely helpful and went above and beyond their duty. Thank you Ropia and Khadija for making my stay more comfortable.

The Movenpick hotel made our family vacation in Morocco, one to remember. It all started with Nehza, the receptionist who greeted us warmly, was eager to check us in and gave us recommendations on what to do in Marrakesh. The hotel grounds and the rooms are beautiful and well maintained. The ladies, Salma, Najat,Mina and the young man Yassine, kept our room clean and replenished every single day of our 7 nights stay. The breakfast buffet is one of the best I have seen in a hotel. What makes breakfast even better is the staff, Mustapha and his son Mohamed, Youness, Hdija, Sami, Nizar and Mariam are all people we became familiar with within the 8 days we stayed at the hotel. Every single day, they were happy to see us and hurriedly assisted us. Thank you all for your service. ‚Ä¶

The hotel is a standard five star hotel. The public rooms are lofty and attractive, but the area in which reception is situated is not well designed, and is inclined to be stuffy. Our room was comfortable and well appointed, although the balcony was too small to take full advantage of. There was always hot water in the shower. A big plus. The restaurant did not offer us an authentic Moroccan menu, which disappointed me, as a first-time visitor to the country. Room service was prompt, well-presented, and tasty, however. The best thing about our stay were the breakfasts, offering a wide variety of foods to suit all tastes, including Moroccan options like jben (a cheese) and m‚Äôsemen (a bread). We were exceptionally well looked after by Bahija, and we commend her to management

First time in Morocco, went as a family with my mother and children. We absolutely had a good experience and a great time at this hotel. Nehza, the receptionist was so welcoming and set our stay in Marrakech in motion. She gave us a beautiful family suite and made recommendations for what to do in Marrakech. She is amazing and we cannot thank her enough. Our beautiful was kept clean every by the dedicated housekeepers Salma, Najat and Mina, we had everything we needed. These ladies were so nice that the children would recognize and greet Salma when they saw her. The breakfast buffet selection is very large and had a great selection of food. The staff was very helpful even with the great number of customers they had to deal with. They all always replied politely to request. One‚Ä¶

column3: Great hotel with a great service
column4: Great hotel in a great location. Great service and very clean. Many thanks to Imane, Fatima, and Malika from house keeping for finding my lost ring and returning it. I was very happy to have it back. Marrakech is an amazing place to visit and would totally recommend staying at the M√∂venpick

I had a wonderful pedicure with najia- she was excellent and kind!! She took a very good care of my feet I really liked the pedicure and hope to do another one soon. I want to come back to this great spa to try other treatments with the staff here at this spa

seconed time here, excellent expeirnce, clean and calm, nice and friendly stuff, cool facilitis such as pool gym and resturants. well done to the excellent housekeeping stuff MME Iman Roqia and Lamia for their great service.

column3: our second time in the hotel and still amazing
column4: The hotel is beautifull... The receptionists Mr Hamza, mouhsin and nezha are very friendly and make you feel at home, they made our stay wonderfull. We got a free upgrade to a superior room with pool view. The room was clean and the beds were comfortabel. thank you so much for all your help and advice. Breakfast was fantastic and the waiters were helpfull and friendly. big thanks to everyone

column3: Beautiful grounds but lousy service. Traveler's stomach warning.
column4: Beautiful grounds, spa, and pool, room was acceptable, and hotel had a nice selection for breakfast. Note there is no indoor pool as mentioned on TA page, but the temperature in the heated outdoor pool was very pleasant in late November. HOWEVER! This is NOT a four-star hotel. Most of our interactions with staff left us inconvenienced and with the impression they are either very overworked, unhelpful, or untrained. -Housekeeping was overworked and semi-responsive -One staff member told me to go next door to heat up my baby food while said baby was crying; it would have been nice if they took the 30 seconds to do it themselves -One staff member "showed us" where the spa and restaurant when asked by walking us all the way through the hotel before emphatically pointing and‚Ä¶

It was a wonderful holiday wiame in the Housekeeping was very friendly helpful everything was good They upgreat our room ^^. They have a lovely swimingpool with good views. It was very good stay , I am so satisfied thank you housekeeping team you're the best good work üòä

It is a reasonable property inside and is well spread. However it lacks the 5 star touch and hospitality and attitude by far. Staff are too relaxed. The room quality is average. A suite is not worth the money. Does not feel 5 star, many things in the room were looking tired. The food quality and choice is very disappointing. No choice at all. Breakfast was boring. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend to stay here. The only positive to this property was the location. My recommendations: 1) increase the variety of international cuisine and for vegetarians, add more food choice. 2) train staff to have a better attitude and care for guests. 3) make changes in the room layout and add bathroom doors for privacy.

It was an amazing experience at this beautiful hotel and Bahija at the breakfast, was so amazing , so full of life and always ready to help. We will definitely visit again. The pool is also usually warm and be sure to find the sauna and gym as well.

Our first time to Africa could not have been better. This hotel was a dream. He staff were so helpful and kind , especially Nacima and Bahija. Highlights were an afternoon by the pool followed by a spectacular chocolate hour. Would highly recommend a stay here

column3: The best hotel in the city
column4: I would like to thank Mr Hamza and hanane from reception for there dedicated and caring service towards us, they helped us from the beginning of the vacation to the end, they were available and answered more perfectly than usual. I wish every hotel had staff like this for his customers who gives a sense of security, rank and care in a hotel. Thank you very much for this experience and definitely coming back again, see you guys Soon!

column3: This was our second stay here and defo 5* in every aspect - service, rooms, food, pool spa, especially hamza at the desk really
column4: Having been a returning customer, the hotel offered complimentary upgrade on arrival which was a bonus as we were planning on paying for the upgrade. From the entrance to lobby to rooms this hotel really takes your breath away, we were welcomed by hamza at the desk who has catered for our every need and want (and we are quite fussy) This hotel has to be the best value for money as you get an amazing 5 star service wherever you go be it the breakfast area or pool or spa and valet parking, every member of staff that we met was polite and hospitable. Food from room service waa delicious and intercontinental breakfast is as good as any other 5 star we have been We travelled with our 1 year old this time and movenpick certainly ticked the box or being child friendly too, Will‚Ä¶

It was a wonderful experience Thank you I had an amazing stay at Movenpic and the Housekeeping was amazing especially wiame , she's so professional and she's very friendly and her team were always available . See you soon üòä best team , clean room with nice view.

If you love photo spots, this hotel is one of the best. The permaculture system in this hotel works well, together with citrus trees that goes to the kitchen, several pools for your relaxing enjoyment, and landscaping where birds can fly free. The housekeeping staffs are excellent. In my experience, Karima is very attentive. The breakfast buffet was marvelous. Even though it is always the same menu everyday, we can choose healthy selections, local delicacies with several different high quality honeys, jams and preserves. The restaurant staffs are helpful, particularly Bahija, Fatima, Meryem, Youness, Haoud Elrddy. The Morrocan tea station at the hotel entrance gives a true Moroccan experience with mint tea and delicacies, and it was available until 6pm everyday by Ahmed "the‚Ä¶

This place is great and worth every penny. Lovely inside, well maintained and the rooms up to a good standard. Food of great quality, staff are super nice and helpful. Ask for Naima during breakfast as she‚Äôs the nicest. Highly recommend. About 30 minutes walk from old town center.

It's one of the best hotels I've ever stayed at and definitely a great first impression as to what Marrakech has to offer. I stayed here for more than a week and it was wonderful from start to finish. The staff were very attentive and helpful. Despite the language barrier, they always went above and beyond to make sure that I got everything I needed (and wanted). The housekeeping staff was excellent, especially under the supervision of Sana (thank you again for the birthday surprise). They always greeted me with a smile and made sure that we got some extra tea üòÜ The breakfast buffet was marvelous. It's always the same menu everyday, and indeed, why change something that's already working well? The food is of high quality and I'm glad that they also offer some local‚Ä¶

Good 5* Hotel with 2 star service Hotel is good location. Rooms are large and nice. Bed comfortable. TV not working. Restaurant food - reasonable Restaurant service - soso. Front Office service is very very poor. Except for Ms Hanane & Nezha, the other front staffs are very ‚Äúcold‚Äù and irresponsible. 1-Triple room with only 2 sets of linen. Despite repeated requests and reminders, nothing done. 2-No morning calls for my group on Departure day despite prior arrangement. The worst staff is Hassan (Reception) he has a very bad attitude. Does not believe in providing service to guests. I stay in this hotel with a contingent of 20 guest. I was responsible to provide information to my group. I asked Hassan many questions and directions, he did not provide any. Has a ‚Äúdon‚Äôt‚Ä¶

My family is having a good stay at the hotel. Kids club is very nice, it is important to stay my son. We can visit others places, they help me very much. The site is clean, it is with good tools, the people are friendly and very good training Hotel clean and huge thanks madame Zoubida The team of kids club are good with all kids thank you touria and kaouter. We will be soonüëçüèΩüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ

column3: Safe and quiet sanctuary to return to.
column4: I came for a week on business and brought my 12-year-old son. Everyone was very friendly and accommodating and we appreciated the warmish pool in Dec. Highlight for us was Ahmed the Roi of tea, a true Saharaween and joy to speak with. I speak Moroccan Darija so it was easy to communicate but a smile is all you need. üòäüá≤üá¶‚ù§Ô∏è

It was a really good experience. The hotel is in a beautiful city. The receptionist was very helpful and all the staff from outside to inside was very nice and helpful. Sana and Farim Zehena provided me with the best outstanding room service experience. They were very friendly and very helpful and I was amazed by that experience. I 100% recommended the hotel.

Fantastic stay from start to finish! Beautiful location, delicious food, and friendly staff. My highlight would definitely be the lovely spa attendant Fatine who took her time to explain the massage process as well as the benefits of it. Would absolutely come back just for sake of her warm and wonderful energy :-)

I really enjoyed my stay at M√∂venpick! The lobby is gorgeous and the staff were very respectful and helpful! I found the service of the Concierge desk excellent and was my best experience at the hotel! Rafiq, the senior Concierge was simply exceptional! He was polite, patient, and professional! He followed up on every request (and I had several - booking restaurants, Hammam, getting silver ring adjusted, confirming shipping details for carpets purchased, etc) to ensure that everything was done to my satisfaction! I did not have to worry about anything and cannot thank him enough! Lamia (concierge) was very helpful in giving me good recommendations for places to visit for shopping and Hammam. Imad, porter, was excellent in ensuring my baggage was properly handled and he also‚Ä¶

A very nice surprise that this hotel and its impeccable services from the transfer to the quality of the rooms and the catering, through the friendliness of the staff and their availability (special thanks to Mouad from Manso restaurant) but everyone deserves thanks . Delicious and varied food, excellent welcome at the bar where we tasted excellent mojitos always served with the smile of the beautiful chaima. See you soon.

Amazing facial with supreme service. Najia was wonderful and perhaps one of the best I have ever had. I must come back!! I highly recommend for others as an experience that cannot be missed when In Marrakech!!!

column3: Clean Room with a nice view
column4: Dear wiame‚ÄôS Team , I was in 4012 I‚Äôma fully satisfied customer .Thank you very much for your excellent service , you maintaining a super clean room a friendless team. Thank Ouaicha wiame for your availability and your hard work for your time and your assist

Mme Imane Rogia and Khadija were exceptional in housekeeping. They did a great job. They should be kept at all cost. Kind women with beautiful heart and very welcoming. Great job from them. I will like to visit this hotel again.

What a Monday dinner ! Tonight after a pleasant cocktail At the bar we have had a tasty dinner at Marcelona All was perfect The service by Khadija really perfect, she was all the time with us , and giving her extra mile . The ambiance was good and the Food full Of flavor Thanks magical Marcelona

I‚Äôve been coming to this hotel for years, and it always a pleasure to come back the staff members ,Mouhsine, Hanane,Souha√Øl,Nezha.. many others i can‚Äôt really remember all their names are very welcoming, their effiency is beyond exceptional and perfect! The rooms and commodities are excellent. beautiful hotel.

The staff was great specially ladies from reception hanane and Laila very kind and friendly Room was very clean Mouhcin made my check out he was professional I recommend this hotel I will be back soon

They have perked up the hotel since I was here in March (amazing how rapidly things like pool beds deteriorate over the years) and it's now even better. The Spanish restaurant continues to be excellent - see pics. A fantastic hotel - a jewel in the Accor crown.

column3: Very wonderful service with the best cocktails
column4: I came to Marrakech with my friends just for two nights and we had the best time ever the rooms was clean and comfortable the breakfast was delicious the pool was nice and the cocktails was super good for us specially thanks to Bader in the Bar he was very professional and thanks to all the staff there i recommend the hotel and hope to come back with my family.

Very good massage from Najia. Would come back to her any day. Very professional. Thank you. Spa was great Thank you Naija for the dedicated service. Would recommend her to guests in Movenpick. Thank you

column3: Lovely option for a stay in Marrakech
column4: I stayed here for a business trip. Spacious, comfortable rooms. Good breakfest buffet. Beautiful premises with opulent decor, nice pool area. Responsive staff. Rugia and Aicha kept the room extremely clean. Easy shuttle to-from airport. Centrally located in Marrakech with easy access to attractions.

column3: Excellent hotel with luxurious, relaxing spa
column4: Enjoyed my stay here will attending a conference. The service was excellent, the pool warm and the atmosphere relaxing. Najia at the spa provided a most relaxing deep tissue massage and pedicure. The hamman was also excellent. Highly recommend the spa.

We had a very good stay at the Movenpick hotel, mr Lachheb Hassan from the room service was so helpful and friendly a big thanks to him and to all the staff, we will for sure come back again me and my friends

Highly recommended. Great property. Very nice staff and extremely clean. Bahija took care of us each morning and provided the best service we‚Äôve had so far from any hotel. My compliments to the chef - Mme. Diane - who made sure our food was tasteful and fresh each morning. Be sure to visit. You‚Äôll enjoy your stay.

A wonderful experience A good h√¥tel , with luxury service. 5/5 Excellent customer service by wiame a housekeeper she helpful available. And a wonderful restoration , they are very welcoming thank Movenpic team thank you for all , I want to come back soon

I came to the hotel for business, but I was surprised by the warm welcome of all the staff, I had lunch at the Manso restaurant, I went to the swimming pool, I forgot that I came to Marrakesh for business I felt like I was on an endless vacation I will certainly come back to this hotel with my family. I would like to thank all pool and restaurant staff Anass Mouad Chaima they are so amazing see you soon.

We had the most sensational and memorable night at Movenpick Marrakech , it is a breathtakingly beautiful venue and every single member of staff encountered was warm , friendly , efficient, knowledgeable and charming , especially Khadija the star of Marcelona who took the time to show us some areas of the hotel and explain it‚Äôs history. It was a very special experience for us when we dined in the Spanish restaurant and served by Khadija in a beautiful table next to the fountain , I will never forget this magical evening and I hope to return one day .

This place is incredible! It has elegant architecture with relaxing and energetic positive space...the food, service and humbleness is incredible!!! From the guest relations, Kalthoum, to the very humble concierges and attendants, it's an absolute beauty. to visit and experience while in Marrakech.

I went to Marrakesh to the movenpick hotel mansour eddahbi. Its a really nice hotel with an excellent service especially the housekeeping staff Fatiha and belaoufir was so welcoming, helpful and friendly. The cleanliness and organisation of the conference meeting room was excellent. For sure we‚Äôre coming back again. Thank you for the phenomenal service.

column3: Shout out to the room service team!!
column4: My stay at the Movenpick has been excellent, and I'm getting to know the room very well - I unfortunately have been unwell, and so haven't been able to explore as much as I'd like, but the staff have taken excellent care of me, particularly room service (and also housekeeping!). They have been kind, prompt, and responsive - and attaching a photo of the continental breakfast! it is enough for 3 meals - truly excellent. Thank you, Movenpick team! I'm feeling much better. :)

my stay was so nice, the staff was so professional. the location of the Hotel is one of the best : just in front of the Magic M avenue. the airport is about 10 minutes from the hotel by car, and also the train station is about 5 minutes by walk. I advise all the visitors of Marrakesh to choose this Hotel.

We did the massage at the spa with Najia I recommend everyone to come to Najia and the spa for massage and Hammam . She is the best. The hotel is very nice with nice crew and amazing food. For a great vacation you should come!!

Amazing hotel lovely breakfast heated pool. We enjoyed our stay. Special thanks to Bahija making sure we had good breakfast and ever so friendly! Very clean hotel staff friendly. Very nice restaurant to dine.

The hotel lobby and public facilities are very nice and well maintained. The rooms (our family had two rooms) were satisfactory but certainly not 5-star quality. The furnishings were a bit worn and stained. We were also disappointed that there was no furniture on the balconies which basically made them useless. We enjoyed the swimming pool and surrounding lounge areas and ate several nice lunches at the restaurant next to the large pool. The concierge was very helpful in providing dinner recommendations and arranging an excursion to the Atlas Mountains. The biggest area for improvement is with service. Upon arrival at the hotel, it took almost an hour for us to check into our room. This was at the end of a long day of travel with our young children. Once we finally got into our‚Ä¶

The hotel is beautiful and the rooms are big and spacious. The customer service is impeccable. Concierge are always accommodating day or night and the staff in the restaurant (Bahija in particular) are very helpful. I would definitely recommend staying here, I personally will be back soon!

column3: Nice hotel with a lovely staff
column4: We stayed for one week at Movenpick And it was an outstanding moment The staff is really professional and very nice A huge and special Thanks to Naima and the restaurant team For their daily warm welcome at the breakfast and the kind gesture they did for my birthday Also the spa is wonderful and we would like to thank Amal and her team for this relaxing moment A big thank to Touria and Iqbal from the kids club who took care of our daughter despite the Low season Great stay and we‚Äôll come back

Wonderful tasty food and service was really excellent There was lovely live music, atmosphere was excellent All the staff were so friendly and lovely Wine selection was good too. Superb service especially by Jihane who looked after us really well

The massage done by Najia at the hotel was fantastic. This is the jest and relaxing massage I have had in ages The care provided by Najia was absolutely fantastic. I do recommend if you do come to this hotel to make sure u ask for Najia. Very professional. Thank u Najia for the wonderful service.

column3: One of the best in Marrakesh
column4: Multiple pool, several buildings, a real mega hotel. Buffet breakfast good quality and starts early, good service at the pool. Many oro;s with a balcone, some with large terraces. Probably great the while year around and mas great in November with the heated pool

column3: Active Older Adult Group Stay-Excellent food and Dining Room Staff!
column4: Stayed 4 nights with a group of older adults from the US as part of a 10 day stay in Morocco. Exceptionally clean and very comfortable rooms with all amenities. Stunning public areas, five beautiful pools with really comfortable lounge chairs and cabanas all available to use at no additional charge (exceptionally fluffy extra large pool towels). Perfect atmosphere, great location. But the real shining stars of this hotel are the staff. Everyone really went out of their way to accommodate our folks who are not the easiest! Smiles all around, very helpful and respectful. The dining room staff really went out of their way to assist and serve our group at the breakfast buffet. We also had a private evening dinner buffet one night and the staff could not have done more. The breakfast‚Ä¶

column3: Stay here! But also read this review to avoid our mistake.
column4: This hotel is truly amazing but make sure you book the right room!! We stayed here for my 50th birthday and we could not have loved it more! The staff are awesome, the pools a welcome oasis, the grounds are magnificent and I could not recommend this hotel more! I would point out that on Hotels.com and bookings.com you can‚Äôt tell that you do not want the non garden view deluxe rooms. We made that mistake but the hotel‚Äôs manager bailed out our mistake and really made our stay 10 stars. So to be clear you want the garden view deluxe room. Allaf you are a rockstar!!

I can‚Äôt tell how happy I am to write you this review having enjoyed all your facilities and that couldn‚Äôt be possible without your exceptional staff and I‚Äôm about to happily state each and one of them: (please forgive if I did not mention some names here) early Az üôè Anass, Hamza, Ismail at the front door and that was at daytime, add to them the crew of nighttime Anouar, rachid, hamza and Hicham. In addition, I‚Äôm very much appreciative of the excellent service of Hamza, the Bar manager, the exceptional star Mourad, the talented Hamza at the Bar ‚Ä¶leila ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ at the bar restaurant by the main pool, exceptional service by the guys, bagagistes, and I can remember particularly Naoufal, the security guys daytime and night, they are very helpful and quite attentive to our safety. I have a‚Ä¶

we were a group of 12 for business, amazing experience, I would like to thank Mr Noury Saladin the hotel CEO for looking after all of us, the service was amazing from check in to check out by liaising me with Khalid front of house manager for our check-in formalities and rooms assignation. All the staff with no exception were nice and smiling from the hotel valets to the receptionists, housekeeping, bar tenders, waiters.... The incredible management of the hotel is obvious, Very well done!!!

column3: Week long family holiday (2 kids under 5yrs old)
column4: Great choice for a family holiday. Both our children have food allergies, and the dining staff went out of their way to cater for these complexities, and there were no issues whatsoever. Massive thanks and gratitude to the following - Diane (Head of Food & Beverages) Sami (Chef) Nizar (Chef) Abdul latif (Restaurant staff) Mehdi (Restaurant manager) Zach (Front Desk) Omar (Swimming pool assistant and waiter) They all made a massive difference in making sure there were no allergic reactions for the kids, thanks so much all!

The breakfast staff on Saturday, October 29th were excellent. Ayoub, Hicham belhaje , amine sourour and Douglas were excellent. They looked after us for a whole week and made us feel at home. It was a pleasure spending time at Movenpick Hotel

Unfortunately this was one of the worst hotel stays we have had. - check in took one hour after travelling all day since 5am with 2 small children. Waited 4 hours for the room to be ready at 4pm - room not what we requested (ground floor suite) it was higher up and awful with one tiny window - cot and single bed not in room as requested took hours of chasing to get it - promised the ground floor suite after breakfast next day. Queued 40m at front desk not ready. Told to come back at 3. At 3 told to come back at 5. - wifi did not work in new suite impossible to stream a tv show or check in flights. Technicians came and went taking a up a whole afternoon no communication and no solution - terrace door did not lock totally unsafe - every interaction with front desk was dreadful‚Ä¶

Touria was everything and more for us on our family holiday. My daughter always wanted to stay in kids club when she was steroids away from a swimming pool... and that's saying a lot. It was so relaxing to know that our kids were in good hands. Touria also sent me many photos of the kids having a good time. Thank you for all the memories to Touria and the staff at kids club.

column3: Not 5 star hotel. 4 star. Really friendly staff.
column4: A good hotel, but not 5 star. The staff were all lovely but there we're so many little things that just meant the stay was not as good as what it could have been; - The cleaners left our door unlocked and open one day after cleaning - Tv had poor reception in the room - I paid extra for a room with a view, but it was just of a palm tree outside the patio door. I was pretty disappointed. It was not a 'view' at all. I complained about this to reception and there is a clause in the booking that defines the view as the pool or the garden but I felt pretty ripped off here to be honest. - One night we were kept awake from 4am because of a loud banging noise in the building. I complained to reception and they told me it was a recuring mechanical issue. We'd booked the Majorelle‚Ä¶

In September 2022 I stayed in M√∂venpick Marrakech. According to my advice and invitation in October 2022 we stayed with 30 special guest at M√∂venpick Marrakech. Our guest was invited by us for a very important event. M√∂venpick team service, rooms , breakfast, everything was amazing. I definitely recommend M√∂venpick Marrakech Hotel. I would like to specially thanks to Mr. Elmzouri Abderrazzak for all his support. M√∂venpick will be my first choice in Marrakech. I strongly recommend.

column3: Th√© best kids club ‚Äúles minis Sultans‚Äù
column4: The best kids club ever- my daughter enjoyed every single days- the girls are just Amazing! They have a variety of activities ( art- cooking- dancing- yoga- backing and Manu more - Plus th√© place is Very clean and they have top neat accessories- the place is amazing! The director and th√© staff are doing √† great job, they are full of √©nergum√®ne and they look perfectly well after each kids- we just loves it and would recomend 100% !! Thank you for all you are doing for th√© kids and for us that perm√Æted me to rest qu‚Äôils m‚Äôy dayghter was inderdaad good hands!

We stayed at Movenpick Marrakech for 7 days and were overall disappointed with our stay. Even though the hotel is rated as a 5 star, the service we received was very poor and definitely not one of a 5 star. We noted several issues during our stay, none of which is the fault of the staff working there (the cleaning ladies were very nice and always happy to help) or but more a reflection of how poor the management of the hotel is: - bathroom towels: There‚Äôs clearly a shortage of towels across the hotel, which meant all towels and washed and redistributed in the evenings. Times where we would come back to the room and werent able to take a shower. We called reception on a daily basis to get towels and they would sometimes take up to an hour to bring the towels delaying our plans‚Ä¶

Movenpick was a beautiful place to go with family. Najia at the spa was really professional. The manicure was teally beautiful. The staff is very dedicated I would highly recommend. I cant wait to come back soon

The spa at movenpick was a great experience with Najia. She was very Accomodating and welcoming. The jacuzzi was always available and the service was excellent. I would rate this very highly for anyone .

column3: This is more like a 3 star hotel
column4: This hotel should not be parading as a 5 star hotel. The hotel is run down, the carpets in the rooms, corridors and communal areas are worn, some areas have grey tape to cover up things, stains everywhere. The sofa in my room had stains on it. The service in the restaurants is awful - given a basket of bread that had a half eaten bread roll in it. The resort is quite expansive, but unfortunately nothing is really sign posted so you could spend ages looking for the gym, the main restaurant etc. I booked a twin room but was given a room with one bed. The breakfast buffet was awful - coffee and tea machines for hot drinks (very tacky and not what you'd expect for 5*), fruit and veg completely abysmal. Had they presented as a 3* hotel and adjusted the daily rate, then I'd be‚Ä¶

Beautiful hotel with an amazing service The fish restaurant of hotel is great üëç Breakfast is excellent üëå Kids club is very nice üòä Rooms are well-maintained Thank you so much üòä ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.:‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

Najia gave me a wonderful massage. Very relaxing and would return to her. Very professional and experienced - it was one of the best massages that was needed after a long weeks work. She has a lot of years of experience

The massage was perfect, by Najia. Najia your are great!! I will come back to you for an other massage. The hotel is also very Good, they have a very Good service. For us it was a great experience, we are coming back to M√∂venpick again.

The service was good. Najia was nice and the massage from FZ was good. When you are in M√∂venpick you need to go to the spa. Music is peacefull and you can do it also together in the same room as your friend. Thank you again Najia!

column3: Najia and Hind Gommage looked after me in the spa and were absolutely brilliant - felt amazing after the massage so good
column4: Absolutely amazing experience in the spa and would definitely recommend all the staff here who were amazing and made me feel so welcome Najia Hind were brilliant and really looked after us and this is an amazing place. Thank you Najia for dedicated service

column3: Top resort and customer care in Marrakech
column4: One of the best resorts I have ever stayed in. The facilities, the design, the services but above all the lovely friendly staff all over the hotel. Laila and Hanane from the reception desk are great example of how customer service should be like. Kudos to the entire Movenpic family.

We checked in to our deluxe room, and it was a horrible stay. First off, the deluxe room building is the furthest building away from the hotel, and by the time we get to our room, the view from our balcony is of a construction site and parking lot. Our room had a particularly strong vinegar smell to it, and we asked to move rooms. We were told that every deluxe room was sold out and we would be able to move rooms the next day. Next day comes around and we didn‚Äôt hear from the hotel. Every call to guest services took at least 3-5 minutes until someone answered or called back. We also came back to our hotel room unlocked, and it seemed housekeeping didn‚Äôt truly close our door when they cleaned it. On our last night, the A/C didn‚Äôt seem to work. We called guest services and the‚Ä¶

column3: Best and most attentive staff - front desk
column4: We would like to send a big and warm thank you to the amazing front desk team - we‚Äôve encountered some issues with our booking agency nevertheless the team managed to solve the issue and welcome us in the best way they could ! we would like to give a good shout out for the *best front-desk team* Hanan, Zak and Soumail! Kind hearted and lovely people ! We love our room !!! - thanks for all the support , this has definitely enhanced our experience !

Used the spa with Najia who is excellent and a credit to the company. I booked a pedicure and masssage which was one of the best. I would highly recommend Najia to anyone and if you are staying here it is worth booking the spa.

Kids club was amazing . Touria nezha and ikbal were amazing with the kids. So patient and kind .I definitely recommend this hotel !! Pool and service is amazing . Very happy !we stayed for 5 nights and would have stayed more !!!! Def recommend !

column3: Massage in the spa √¥ de rose
column4: Simply amazing Najia & Iman, thank you for a truly wonderful and relaxing massage. The spa is beautiful and the hotel setting is incredible! The massage was the best I have ever had! I can‚Äôt wait to return to Najia & Iman!

The stay at movenpick was excellent. Had a great time with great service. My spa tratment at the spa with Najia was awesome. She was very welcoming and has given me the best of the massage. I wish anajia lots of success and good work atbthe soa. Thanks

Excellent hotel, the Spa was amazing , especially with Najia, who is kind and professional. I will definitely recoommend anyone visiting marrakech and looking for a real 5 stars hotel to book with and try the massage at spa. Ask for Najia. Will be back

It was a good massage with najia And I thanks hind the spa receptionist for the good welcoming‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.thanks again the spa o de rose in love pick‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ from me‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶,,,,,,,,,,ffhhh gaoodood‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.thanks againhhh for good service and welcoming

I travel around the world , and I‚Äôm passionate about relaxation and self care. I had the best massage ever In Movenpick Spa, NAJIA make me feel like she was reading my mind , knowing exactly where to press with the right intensity. Thanks NAJIA for such a treat, Ill come back to Marrakesh and for sure I‚Äôll book this massage again. Great experience, Highly recommended, professional and and makes you feel comfortable. Merci!!!

Bartender Adil, was the best bartender I‚Äôve had in a long time. He made a fantastic vodka apple drink that was both refreshing and extremely tasty. Worth visiting. Additionally, the environment around the pool was excellent with excellent service all around.

column3: Great hotel and experience! Massage with Nadia!
column4: Great hotel experience! Very friendly staff. Escpislly enjoyed the different swimming pools and the great massage of Najia at the swimming pool. Can highly recommend to other! In the morning they have great breakfast with amazing omelets. Thanks again to the manager of the spa! Very kind and helpful in our journey.

Great spa i do recommend Hind the spa receptionist front disk was very helpful and supportive mean while the therapist Ms Mona was so expert in doing Hamamm and Massage i would like to give warm greetings to Ms Alawi Zabidah from front disk as well Thank you once again

Since I don't know much about SPAs, madame Amal helped me a lot and guided me to make the best choices. I've had a wonderful and relaxing time. Would do it again in a heartbeat and would highly recommend to anyone visiting Marrakech.

column3: Great experience in this great hotel
column4: Great experience at the Movenpick Marrakech where everything went smoothly and from food to room to service was great. Their business team is very good to. All of that in a very quiet part of Marrakech. Special thanks to Rak at the front office.

column3: The best massage in movenpick Marrakech
column4: Stay at the movnepick hotel Very good experience. We did a massage at the hotel spa very professional and good treatment made by Najia and Moenq . The best massage In Morocco . We will certainly come back to the spa in movenpick Very recommended massage of those 2 nice and professional lady‚Äôs.

We spent 4 fantastic days at the Movenpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi Marrakech. The hotel is spectacular, Rooms are amazing, Staff extremely friendly and very helpful. Douaa the guest relations manager was excellent and an asset to the hotel. Front of house staff were very helpful. Food was very nice

column3: I had THE BEST pedicure at the spa with Bouchra!!!
column4: Bouchra was friendly and very good at her job. I felt so taken care of and my pedicure turned out beautifully. I was a walk in, so the fact that she and the spa were so accommodating was fantastic. I look forward to telling all my friends!!!

I had a deep tissue massage and it was so relaxing, I didn't want it to end. Najia, was very friendly and professional and made me feel really comfortable. Her massaging was very good and will definitely get more on my stay! Thankyou.

Very good experience, staff is amazing, rooms are well furnished and everything is really clean. A big thanks to Neja at the Spa for the massage ! I highly recommend this hotel for an amazing Moroccan escape !

It was amazing massage. Najia is very professional It was a great time Everyone needs to do it for relaxing Ask at the reception for a deep massage with Najia The spa and the hotel are very pampering and luxurious

Excellent body massage by Najia. Highly recommended. I‚Äôll certainly come back again for this. Room is nice with calm music. Spa is also excellent. I‚Äôll recommend to book in advance to avoid any congestion.

I strongly recommend deep tissue massage with Najia. Worth a try, very relaxing and gives you lots of energy. The pedicure with Najia is also recommended. Bahia is very professional and I will recommend her. Very good customer service overall and facilities.

I'm not really used to writing reviews but we had such a wonderful holiday that I wanted to share it now: Wonderful hotel that meets all expectations! In particular the friendly staff, who are always ready to give you best of service, will make your stay a completely successful holiday. The spa and hammam are also highly recommended, especially Najia's massages are an experience to remember and a reason to visit the Movenpick hotel again!

Very nice spa treatments I had in this place. Now it is my favourite spa. I will definitely come back again. Especially I liked Narva, the food massage she did was amazing. I would recommend this spa for everyone who want to enjoy and a proper rest.

It is very beautiful are of spa section. Nice swimming pool , warm sun, calm place. People are kind, warm-hearted, pleasantly friendly. Very good service. Visiting the spa for feet massage was a very good decision. Thank you, Najia, it was an awesome pleasure.

Very nice hotel with excelent massage service. Spa is a very clean and comfy. Foot massage is perfect. Najia has a very good hands for massaz. Thank you Amal and Najia for your service. Will recomend it deffinetely to try! Hope to see you soon again!

I recommend everybody to try foot massage with Najia. Its really pleasure! Najia is really professional! you will receive great experience and pleasure. Najia is very nice person, very polite and professional

I had the honor of attending a meeting organized at the Palais des Congr√®s in Marrakech. The decor, the organization, the reception are irreproachable. I was amazed at the passage from the Palace to the restaurant where lunch was waiting for us. A large buffet with very good food really bravo to the chef and pastry chef.

Wonderful Hotel and SPA. helpful staff, nice location, and wonderful conference room. Don‚Äôt miss a session of gym with Brandon. A life changing experience with his advice, expertise and sympathie on the top. I would like to return in holidays.

We had a lovely couples black soap scrub and hammam on our first day. They were very professional and attentive. We also had an amazing poolside foot massage by Najia. I have to say, Najia, the reception manager Emal and their team are wonderful and I highly recommend their services.

Had a lovely therapy at the spa in the hotel and also a foot massage at the pool side by Najia. The environment and facilities were great and the staff could not be more lovely & helpful. Special thank you to Najia & Madame Emal.

The massage was awesome to say the least with Massage therapist Najia, she is simply the best in deep tissue. I highly recommend her any day, she is definitely my reason to keep coming back to the Movenpick hotel. Will be back.

The spa was lovely and all the staff were very helpful, especially Najia who was wonderful. The facilities are great and it‚Äôs a perfect place to relax. Najia made the trip a great success and helped me recharge my batteries - a welcome break

I came to the hotel with my friends to have a fun week-end and I was amazed by the sincere welcoming of every person I crossed! I want to specially mention the Nice lady from HR (soukaina) Who have suggested several must-visits in the city! A big thank you goes to Souhail and Rafiq from the reception team... I will certainly visit the hotel again mainly for the good service but also because it's close to the M avenue/downtown and the m√©dina.

Najia did a very nice message and I felt completely relaxed during the process. It was my first massage and it was fully worth it. Both my wife and I enjoyed it and I would highly recommend anyone to come. Thank you Najia

Spent the first part of the week attending an international conference located at the Movenpick with non-stop meetings. Hotel was convenient, plenty of space for breakout meetings and additional rooms available to reserve for private conference space. Meanwhile, my spouse was able to utilize the hotel as her base for relaxing and exploring while I was at the conference. Second part of the trip is now a short vacation and hotel‚Äôs central location and ease of taxi access has been great for exploring greater Marrakech. In addition, the pool and on site restaurants make for an easy base to simply stay put and relax!

The hotel design is amazing even when we always get lost in the lobby hahahaha we came here for the event and literally everything was perfect from the beginning to the end the staff at the front desk did an amazing job during the event, And I want to mention to Mr Hamza at the front desk because he was so helpful and he answered every question i ask also he did help me at the ATM when i couldn't be able to get some money, I really would like to thank him and his colleagues for working so hard to make everything looks wonderful if someone did ask me about a Luxury hotel in Morocco, definitely the Movenpick will be my number one !!

Najia at the spa was lovely! She did an amazing job on my pedicure, I felt very relaxed and very well take care of. The room was private and well maintained. I would recommend everyone to stop in to see her to get pampered!

We spent 5 nights at the hotel and couldn‚Äôt have asked for anything more for our first time in Marrakesh. Due to a conference, the hotel couldn‚Äôt fulfil our final two nights and we we transferred to an alternative hotel. However, the hotel more than compensated us for the inconvenience, with an upgrade to a fabulous suite and a half-board stay. The service and hospitality of the staff was exceptional, with a particular thanks to head concierge Rafiq, Ayoub from Jamra, Hamza from the main restaurant and bar, and Hassan at pool side. The hotel was beautiful and clean, and we really enjoyed our meal at the Spanish restaurant as well as Jamra. The hotel is a short drive from the Medina and not far from key sites such as Koutoubia. We really enjoyed the excursion booked via the‚Ä¶

What an amazing feeling with her massage - absolutely professional, not only only the basic massages Najia made, but also relaxing, or tonique, and especially Massage of 5 monde!!! Strongly recommend when you come to Marrakech to book a massage with Najia - Spa M√∂venpick - you will not regret!!!

column3: Wonderful mani pedi at the Spa!
column4: Bouchra and Nadja took great care of me with a classic mani pedi. Great attention to detail, my nails have never looked so good and cared for. And so relaxing with a lovely massage on my feet too. Merci!

Very pleasant meal with old friends in the Barcelona Resturant made all the more special with Khadija and Soukaima (possibly not the right spelling) attention warmth. These two made up for any short comings.

I Had a pedicure at the spa today at the hotel. Najia provided excellent service and was a relaxing treatment. Najia gave me the best pedicure And foot massage. I wIll recommend to others! I will be returning for a massage

I had an hour massage booked in with Najia at the spa, she was super friendly and accommodating. One of the best massage‚Äôs I‚Äôve had. The price is reasonable however the massage was so good I‚Äôd go again!

Nice hotel with great bar service by Mourad - such a nice person and great professional! Thank you Mourad for the amazing experience, we really appreciated it! Looking forward to come back to you soon

Najia I‚Äôm the spa gave me the most incredible massage today 10 out of 10 would highly recommend. All the spa staff are lovely and it is so much quieter in this pool and you can order food to your relaxing sun lounger

Stayed in Room 4207 for 7 nights all the staff were friendly and welcoming. Ayoub looked after us when we were at the pool. Eat in the hotel restaurant twice the food was wonderful and sfter a miss understanding about the starters Soufiane explained what went wrong and we were happy with the out come and was so sorry it had happened. He is a good manager. Breakfast is amazingly. Hope we will be back soon. Thank everyone at the Mavenpick Marrakesh.

The staff is unreal, absolutely amazing service especially from the baker Sami (patisserie) and his colleague skiriba cavalire tooop . Anytime it looked like we needed something we were brought more food and drinks without requesting. The service is top notch and our arrival was very relaxing. Pools, spa, gym and rooms are fantastic too. Definitely recommeding this hotel to anyone who is looking for a place and im looking forward to the remainder of my stay here. Mrc l chef Mahdi and karim my yousef aytfars

I came with two friends to discover the hotel amazed by all the details, really beautiful place to be, The food was good, excellent service,big salut to the waiters Ayoub and Adil bar best cocktail, loubna, they was so nice with us with their large smile, ILL BACK FOR SURE .

column3: Excellent service but property needs some TLC
column4: The hotel and location is very good but the property would not fall into 5 stars or anything luxury. The rooms need some TLC and touching up. The pool tiles/drain needs to be looked at. My toe got badly injured and on the first day as coming out of the pool, which meant I couldn‚Äôt use the pool anymore with my kids with an open wound. I pent half a day at the local hospital to stop the toe from bleeding. Breakfast was very good. Excellent eggs, freshly squeezed orange juice and fresh pastries but they need to sort out the earl grey tea supply and stop people from taking 20 tea bags (yes some guests were literally filling their pockets with tea bags as if there is a tea crisis). The hotel grounds are stunning with gardens and fruit trees like it is all over Marrakech. What‚Ä¶

stayed here just me and my son and daughter. the hotel is very beautiful with cool interiors and bold colours. the pool area and the restaurants were all great although the pool was generally very busy with the usual towel reservation system going on! worthy of mention as outstanding were the concierge team Leicester sorry about the spelling, she was professional, knowledgeable and very helpful to us and went out of her way to make our stay wonderful. She is certainly a five star employee. also great we‚Äôre the ladies who cleaned our room 6206 Selma and Roqia who were excellent accommodating our late starts and keeping our room spotless. it‚Äôs theses and employees and some others that elevate this hotel from. 4 star to 5 Star. we would love to come back this time with my‚Ä¶

My family enjoyed everything in this hotel, the staff marry umesh and ryzza are very good staff Swimming pool are so good and clean Chocolate hours also very good we enjoy free chocolates We will comeback in the hotel inshallah

column3: Good stay supported by friendly staff.
column4: Service staff was very friendly and very attentive. Overall the hotel was good however the room became a bit dated and despite a very helpful pool boy it was always a hassle to get a sun bad in the morning next to the pool. The kids club was fantastic. Touria took very well care of the kids. Thank you!

The staff are amazing, the hotel services are great, and the view is terrific. I will definitely be coming here again!! Hassan from the pool/ Spa has been great, he has been helping me around, assisting me, and checking up on me and my husband. His service is great, and he is very welcoming! We loved spending our time here!!

Stayed at the Movenpick hotel. Really enjoyed the hotel. The breakfast food was very delicious. Great for families. The staff are super helpful and friendly. Especially Bahija, My Yusuf and karim. Would definitely come back.

I stayed in the Movenpick hotel Marrakesh for nearly one month with my 8 years old son. The service was excellent. The stuff was really nice. And i want to recommend the kids club who was one of the favourite part of my son journey. They are very professional . They was always happy to have more kids every day . And they do have so many different activities such as painting. Board games. And other group activities. My son speaks English it was hard for him to make friends in the hotel but once he gets to their kids club he didn‚Äôt have this problem anymore because the staff they all speak English perfectly and they helped him to make new friends and learn new language to communicate with them. I strongly recommend this place.

We enjoyed the chocolate Hour in Hotel, the chocolate is very delicious üòã. Thank you all staff. We spent a nice time at the hotel. column3: A great hotel to stay at
column4: My friend and I visited this hotel to stay for our first time in Marrakesh. I‚Äôm so glad we chose to stay here. The staff is very kind and accommodating, specifically Amoud and Mohammad . The head concierge Rafiq helped us book several tours and helped ensure we had the most pleasant stay. He went above and beyond to help teach us about Marrakech, the culture and the best things to do and see. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone just coming to relax for holiday, or someone who wants to go out and explore the city, this hotel caters to everyone! The amenities are lovely including multiple pools and the breakfast each morning is stunning. We will certainly be back and bring our family and friends

From the moment we stepped onto the property we were immersed in all the finer things that Marrakech can offer. From the array of scents, the decor, the food and to the hospitality; it was nothing but the best. The head concierge Rafik made sure we had everything we needed and all of our activities were planned to the very last detail! With our transportation, the private tour of the gardens, Mosque, and souk. We did not have to worry about a thing! The consistency of hospitality we experienced from the restaurants and bars; was one of a kind. The staff at this property do their job with such pride, love and care. Every corner we were welcomed with a smile and ‚ÄúBonjour!‚Äù. My first trip to Marrakech will forever be a trip of a lifetime! I can not wait until I get to enjoy‚Ä¶

column3: US-AFRICA BUSINESS SUMMIT 2022: July 19 - 22, 2022 in Marrakech, Morocco
column4: Merci beaucoup to the entire Movenpick Hotel Marrakech team for making our US-AFRICA BUSINESS SUMMIT 2022 a huge success! Special shoutout to the amazing team members who went above & beyond and have executed excellent service from start to finish! I would like to express my sincerest gratitude to the following Movenpick Hotel team members on behalf of my CCA team: SALES/EVENTS TEAM: ‚Ä¢ Zahira Lakreb, Senior Project Manager who is my main contact; have done an excellent job in leading her entire team & have shown remarkable customer service & professionalism to our CCCA team. I enjoyed working with Zahira; her personality, humor and patience are one of her best assets. Movenpick Hotel is very lucky to have Zahira! She is definitely an asset to the hotel. ‚Ä¢ Nadia Hamaras,‚Ä¶

column3: Massage in the spa o de rose
column4: Loved Najia! Great massage that was relaxing and calming. My husband and I enjoyed the experience together in a couples room then jacuzzi afterwards with the light coming through the roof was delightful!

We had a royal hammam followed by a lovely couples deep tissue massage with Bouchra & Najia at the Movenpick Marrakech spa. It was firm, relaxing and would highly recommend to others travelling to Marrakech!

column3: Sensational setting and facilities, modest level of customer attention.
column4: A really impressive and mature environment with excellent facilities. Service in the open air cafeterias wasn‚Äôt great to be honest. Staff a little disinterested and/or overwhelmed. But it didn‚Äôt spoil the experience as such.

The pedicure with Najia at the Hotel Movenpick spa was wonderful. Najia worked very meticulously and carefully and left my feet looking new (and beautiful) again after many days of walking in the Marrakech heat! Najia has expert skill set and I would recommend her to anyone who needs a pedicure!

column3: If you after customer service and peace in your room this is not for you.
column4: Check in was fine after an overnight flight, rooms were ready when we arrived at the hotel, hotel looked beautiful, in the evening we could hear loud loud music in the room, it was from the hotel opposite, it felt like we were literally on the doorstep of a night club, we had booked 3 rooms, this is the last thing we needed with children, we could not sleep till the music stopped at 12am, took 3 phone calls and 2 hours later before the hotel finally agreed to swap rooms, this is the last thing you need after you have unpacked and settled in your room, had issues with air conditioning in the room, engineer came at 11pm did something but make no difference, we ended up trying to sleep sweating in a room with aircon not working, it was horrible. Following morning I rang reception‚Ä¶

It was excellent especially thanks to Hanane who gave us a nicer room with a view and accommodate us for a late check out since our flight was at 8 pm. As a frequent flyer with more than 4 MM miles flow all over the world I highly recommend the Movenpick Marrakesh!

column3: Amazing service from Lamiae and friendly staff
column4: As this was my first visit to Marrakech, I needed all the advice and local tips I could get. Lamiae, the concierge, was amazing! She gave me great recommendations of restaurants, advice on what to pay the taxis and then the best service of all was when I needed to buy some gifts, she phoned the shop in Menara Mall and had someone ready to help me! It was a pleasure to stay at the hotel. All the staff, from the waiters in the restaurant, to the omelette chefs at breakfast, to the doormen and cleaning lady, were friendly, helpful and very professional. Thank you for treating me so well.

column3: Amazing Treatment with Najia at Spa
column4: Najia gave the best massage - didn't want to leave. Be sure to check out the hamam. It is truly an experience. The entire experience was peaceful. She is very nice and wants to make sure you're getting a great service.

I liked the Movenpick Mansour hotel, very much. It is centrally located in the Hivernage district; Other lovely hotels, cafes and easy transport links. The roads are so clean there as well. The route from the airport is so close. I was surprised at the modern architectural design, as well as an unusual discreet entrance. It is a bird in the cage/ garden and fountain style entrance, with a huge bronze/brown automatic curved door. The floors are so glossy, and scent throughout the lobby is filled with the fragrance of fresh roses! I understand why they have a five star rating! The check-in was swift, attendance to take the luggage and proceed to the bedroom was also on point. I had a first floor superior room with small terrace, front facing the garden/side pool area; Just as‚Ä¶

Beautiful hotel. Amazing breakfast. Accommodating staff. Main pool area could use updating as chairs were broken and/or cushions needed replacing. There‚Äôs an amazing spa like smell throughout the hotel, this adds to the feeling of relaxation.

Stayed there 3 years ago, when it was a beautiful hotel ruined by incompetent management. Mercifully,and rather unexpectedly, the top management has been replaced, the staff now feel and act a lot happier, and this time we had a fantastic stay. Rather oddly, some of the in-house restaurants have not yet reopened, so worth checking exactly what is open now. But the breakfast is to die for, the pools are exceptional, and the staff are now friendly and cooperative. The concierge is fantastic, the Moroccan tea delicious, the Spanish restaurant delightful, The position is a little incongruous. In one direction is a shopping mall ( air conditioned, Carrefour supermarket), in the other the roads area bit derelict. But the neighbourhood is actually very safe, and the people you pass‚Ä¶

I had an issue upon checkin and the assistant manager Nuzha listened, proposed changes and implemented. She is great in assisting and fixing issues. She was able to attend to my request to change the room in no flash. She is competent and problem solver. Great for the hotel to have someone like her. Other staff, Noufal and Othman, were quick in attending to my room change helping me in sorting things out in no time. Bravo

I had two treatment sessions with Najia, massage and facials. Her hands are just magical to say the least. Najia is the queen of massage and facials. I travel around the world and have many spa treatments but Najia is without any doubt the best. Just go try and thank me later.

I had a very massage with Najia and the treatment was very good. Najia gave me a very professional and delicate service. I will definitely come for another treatment with Najia before i leave. I recomemnd Najia to anyone who comes here. Thank you

AmaZing food and staff, staff member named Naima was amazing always helping us and offering us drinks :D Mariem was also very good and polite kept us up to date consistently. Honestly had an amazing time at this hotel

Outstanding service and great experience with Najia. The massage was amazing. Very professional and amazing service. Got a facial and massage it was best the I have had ever. Got a hammam with Hind which was outstanding as well and definitely will be coming back to Najia and Hind.

I have returned to the Movenpick for my sixth time, and once again the service from the staff was impeccable as the staff could not do enough for us. Yet again, I was incredibly impressed. The breakfast staff were extremely attentive, taking great pride and care in their job and were such hard workers. In particular, My Youssef ( the breakfast manager) and the waiters; Mohamed skiriba, Mohamed kabaj and Bahija, who served us, could not do enough for us, and If we wanted anything, they would immediately try to meet our needs as quickly as possible and treated us as if we were royalty. These workers take hard work and dedication to another level and put it into perspective onto how little we have it in the Uk. These staff put great pride into their job and it shows in every‚Ä¶

I had a really good massage with Bouchra, she treated me so well and she was really nice all the time. She did an amazing job, 10/10 recommended!! The message was an hour long and it was completed, full body

Beautiful place to holiday. Shout out to Perfect host Bahija in the breakfast restaurant for a courteous service. MysSelf and my daughter were really well looked by Bahija . Could not have asked for a better host. Beautiful place to stay Heat the only exception too hot in July 10/10 service for hostess Bahija, thank you

Fantastic massage from Najia who took care of applying the pressure on some pain points and always checked whether I was enjoying the massage. I would highly recommend the spa massage and especially Najia

Excellent service and very helpful. Breakfast was great and food was very tasty. Spacious bedrooms and lovely lunch options. It was a great experience. Thank you Bahija for your courteous service. 10/10

We had an amazing time at the swimming pool and the room was beautiful big shout out to the reception team specially HAMZA because we didn‚Äôt like our first room and he really try his best to give us a room with swimming pool view. We really appreciate everything and we definitely coming back again üëçüèªüëèüèª

column3: Marvelous hotel in a marvelous city
column4: We stayed at Movenpick Marrakech for our first visit to this special city. The property itself is first class and a great value for the price. Moreover, the service from the team was top notch. Concierge Rafiq set up a guided city tour for us, hosted by Rachid. I would highly recommend that you find Rafiq when you arrive and explain to him what you want to see. Rafiq also set up a camel tour for us, which was also a lot of fun. Go and experience all that Marrakech and Movenpick have to offer!

Firat day areiving in Marrakech. The weather is hot so think will rwlax at the hotel. Had hammam and deep tissue massage. Excellent treatment especially the oil massage from Naijia! Would recommend her. Very nice experience everall. Thanks Naijia :)

Nice stay in nice hotel with friendly staff. Especially Rafiq and Othmane helped me very good. Nice swimming pool and location was good. Would definitely go back. Breakfast variety enough and friendly staff.

It was an amazing time and we had so much fun at swimming pool and the breakfast was delicious, Also big thanks for reception team specially Hamza and hanane because we did get an early check in and the room was wonderful, we were so happy about that Thanks to everyone who‚Äôs trying to keep the hotel always on toppp ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

This is our second time in this hotel and we are definitely coming back. The staff make you feel at home and the service is beyond great. My husband got sick with a sun stroke in the first 2 days and I was alone with my daughter. He could not leave the room. Bahija from the breakfast helped me so good and made me feel less alone. She advised me about what medicine my husband could take and what was good for him to eat. She is a live saver!!! Without her I would not survive these days. She took such great care of us and treated us like family. Amine was always quick to help set our table and offer us drinks and food. Very kind and always a smile on his face. The Manager my Youssef was on top of everything and new exactly what was going on and surely as soon as my husband was‚Ä¶

column3: If you want fancy, look more!
column4: Very nice employees. The hotel is old and need a facelift. The SPA is a little disgusting. People can smoke everywhere, so if you don‚Äôt smoke, you will second hand! The breakfast is really good with a large variety of food. The pool area need a better maintenance. The check out was a nightmare.

Had a great stay with this hotel. Their staff are amazing. Amazing service from Bahija at breakfast. Salma from the hospitality team. The public areas are beautiful and well maintained and there‚Äôs a lovely smell. Thank you for a lovely and lovely time.

My massage with Najia was very relaxing and she was very thoughtful and catered to all my requests. Her hands felt wonderful and she placed me in a very relaxed state. I fully recommend booking with Najia. Also thank you to Hind at reception.

The stay was lovely and the reception team was very kind and lovely specially Hamza and Nezha. Good service and the room was clean and beautiful. loved the breakfast and the swimming pool is amazing Big thanks to all the staff üëèüèª‚ù§Ô∏è

This is my favourite hotel in Marrakesh. Everything is clean, organised and nice. The breakfast is my favourite part where you can find all type of food. The employees are kind and helpful. Many thanks to Hicham, Zakarya and Najat to making my mornings wonderful.

We are having an AMAZING time. The service and food. Everybody is happy help, we met Cavalier Skiriba and Naima AND Karim who we so generous with their time. We'll definitely come back!! Just lurrrvvee

Movenpick is an absolute favourite, but my last trip really stood out for my wife and I and that is thanks to the great work of Hamza and Souhail at Reception who are incredibly efficient and attentive to all your needs. Many thanks guys!

column3: Outstanding service, best hotel in marrakech
column4: Excellent work from Leila at the reception and Hanane they are truely amazing ! They have gotten us a room super fast and according to our requirements. And also Muhammed from the breakfast has been super kind and he provided excellent service he actually took the initiative and brought us Tea and orange juice and kept checking on us.

it was amazing expirance, massage was very good . Najia was great, very good hands! scrub with Hind also amazing. i recomend it . relax and pleasure. u dont need anything else. Thank both ladies for a great services.

column3: Poor service and main pool not available
column4: I am on my 2nd here , staying at room 3233, I only booked this expensive hotel due to the main pool but it has been booked out for last 2 days for a conference. So all residents have to make do with a really small pool which you see in 3 star hotels at best. I came here 8 weeks ago and stayed at the riad dar anika which service is 10/10. When checking in I was told the pool will be available tomorrow which it wasn't. Also sitting here at the pool restaurant I have has to wait 15 mins to be served and there are about 4 staff and only 10 tables. Not looking forward to the next 5 days at all.

We stayed at the Movenpick for three nights and enjoyed our experience overall. The hotel is beautiful with modern Moroccan style, especially the entrance and lobby areas. The pools and manicured grounds offer a lush oasis in the hot desert climate, and the daily breakfast was plentiful in selection and quality (freshly made sfenj Moroccan donuts and fresh squeezed orange juice!). The female concierges were delightful and very helpful in answering questions about Marrakech, assisting with dining reservations and transport. Unfortunately, this is not a 5-star hotel. The rooms are quite worn with stains/tears on the carpet and bathroom tile, and fading and dirt on fixtures (lamp shades, bathroom towel bars/mirrors). The front desk staff were highly unfriendly each time we sought‚Ä¶

We spent 3 nights in this hotel where is located about 10 minutes of car ride from the Main square. This spacious hotel consist of several separate quarters so you never felt it's over crowded & only have 3 floors. Room were always clean & bright, at least 3 outdoor swimming pool. I really enjoy their breakfast at Restro Savoy & was very well organized by their manger Myyoussef & Balija. Their English skill was up to the good service standard and great with details.

Me and my husband stayed at this hotel for our honeymoon. Such a lovely and friendly hotel. Staff are really friendly and always there to help. The design and layout of the hotel is absolutely stunning! The hotel is situated near a little mall with lots of food places near by which also a plus. shout out to a lovely staff member called ayoub who works at the om yoga bar. such a lovely guy who made us every flavour of virgin mojitos that we couldn‚Äôt find anywhere in this big city. Not only that he was very welcoming from day 1 and always friendly. Thank you to everyone who‚Äôs made our stay lovely.

We had a couple massage in Spa Movenpick. I liked so much the relaxing massage by Najia. Her warm and tender hands and personal attitude for me really nice. Najia is very nice and always ask for feedback. Recommended.

column3: Amazing hotel, even more amazing staff
column4: Movenpick is a very modern hotel, with imponent architecture, fancy and luxurious, bot not stuck up. The breakfast is formidable, infinite options, from typical morrocan delicacies to french pastries. Noteworthy the very kind staff that measure no efforts to satisfy guests, like the cheff who promptly squeezed grapefruits when I mentioned I liked the juice and the concierge, Monsieur Said, who was absolutely fantastic, with great suggestions and finding ways to make reservations at busy restaurants last minute and always asking about my experience.

I created a TripAdvisor account specifically to warn you against visiting this hotel. I wrote this review after visiting the hotel but it had been sitting in my review drafts since ny visit! There are so many problems associated with this hotel that I just can not mention them all. We stayed here for 8 days. I have split the review into Accommodation/resort, dining and service. I will start with the accommodation/resort: The main pool was ridiculously overcrowded and freezing cold. I have no idea why they did not turn up the heating a bit more. It was really unpleasant to swim in. There was another pool near the Abou Faris buildings, that was even colder than the main one! Absolutely freezing! It was also filled with lots of dead bees floating on the water. The suite was good,‚Ä¶

Amazing staff, very accomodating. Hind the Spa receptionist managed to fit us in for a last minute session and really friendly. Amal, the manager ensured we were greeted with care. The massage therapist had magic in her hands! Would definitely recommend.

column3: Nezha, thank you for a fabulous Birthday!
column4: A Big thank you to Nezha for making my Birthday so special! This has been one of the most magical birthdays I have ever had!!!! I would also like to thank Abdellatif, Khalid from the front desk, lovely Bahija who always looked after us at breakfast and finally the hard working girls who cleaned our rooms Samira, Yassmine and Mina! Do not hesitate to book this amazing hotel the rooms are very comfortable and there is lots to do from spa treatments, 3 pools and 2 restaurants.

We had a wonderful experience during our stay in the hotel. Particularly the quality of the atmosphere , the service as well as the commitment of the staff .
