My thanks to HASSAN and ISSAM of the SPA pool for their humbleness, kindness besides that my thanks goes also for the passionate and devoted YOUNESS of the pastry.

column3: Fantastic hotel and experience. Many thanks to Laila at reception
column4: We were immediately impressed by the staff at the Movenpick especially being our first time visiting Marrakech . Laila at the reception has been especially attentive catering to our every need aswell as offering recommendations. The lobby area is amazing aswell as the facilities and breakfast in the mornings. Our room was splendid and we enjoyed our stay. Will definitely visit again with family and friends soon Thank you Laila for being a fantastic host

I booked in a treatment for myself but wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect I can say it was an amazing experience with iman for a wonderful hammam and massage I would recommmed to anyone Very professional lady

I received an amazing massages from lovely Najia. Honestly one of the best most relaxing massages I‚Äôve ever had. I wish I could have her massages back in London. 100% recommend Najia, if you want to unwind and take all your stress away! Shukran kteer Najia!!!

column3: Best hotel to stay‚Ä¶ specially with small kids.
column4: Superb hotel with special attention to details towards its clients. The hotel is beautifully designed , it offers 3 different swimming pools and an incredible kids club. Touria, Nezha and Ikbal have been very lovely and caring with our children, creating everyday new games and fun activities for them to enjoy. We also wanted to thank Mme Naima et Sami from the restaurant for the lovely Attention towards my family and to Guillaume, the executive chef that prepared the best breakfast and meals throughout our stay. I highly recommend the hotel, we are definitely coming back. Very grateful

column3: Platinum service from Nezha from reception!
column4: Another fantastic stay at the Movenpick in Marrakech! This time I am here for my sisters birthday and thanks to wonderful Nezha, she has given my sister a Birthday she will never forget! On our arrival date Nezha wasn't even working, but due to her 10 out of 10 customer service skills, she kindly contacted her colleagues Abdellatif and Khalid to help me make my sisters birthday trip special. I can't thank Nezha and her colleagues enough for everything they have done! Movenpick hotel are lucky to have such a wonderful dream team! Keep up the excellent work guys! .

Literally the best massage I ever got in my life! Thank you so much Iman, leaving like a completely new person! I can‚Äôt recommend her enough! I had a traditional Moroccan oil massage and I felt in heaven! Thank you so so much ‚ù§Ô∏è

I visited the spa with NAjia for a massage and it was amazing!! Definitely recommend! The massage was very calming and the atmosphere was great. She was very polite and helpful and made me feel very comfortable. Definitely book in with her it was amazing!

Nice hotel, great location, easy to get in and out of the city. The staff was wonderful. The hotel is well maintained. The beds were very firm, The food was good. We will stay here again when back to Marrakech.

Shout out to Othmane and crew. I had an unexpected extended stay here due to a covid quarantine and he and his team made quarantine way more bearable. Very attentive, kind, and responsive. Besides the wonderful staff there‚Äôs some really good amenities here. I loved the breakfast (which is a massive spread) and the pool / bar. There are at least 3 pools I think, and it‚Äôs really nice to sit and take everything in. Drinks are nice but I‚Äôll admit there were a couple of drinks the bar staff wasn‚Äôt familiar with (but we made do). Overall great experience and great location. Hotel is able to coordinate doctors for PCR / antigen tests and arrange transportation to airports. They handled everything very professionally.

She was a great masseuse, told her areas of concern in upper back and shoulders and she focused on these areas brilliantly. Very relaxing massage, felt very rejuvenated afterwards. Choice of music or no music offered. Would highly recommend!

Staff are very kind , at breakfast Bahija was very kind and gave us anything we needed, so grateful! Thanks Ma yusif thanks for a lovely breakfast , kids and adults loved the atmosphere! :) Love from Hussain Family !

column3: Excellent hospitality and service in the breakfast
column4: Excellent service and excellent hospitality from Mr.my yourself and bahia mustapha Thank you!!! Nice location and very beautiful environment All are perfect Only negative is the size of the rooms but I recommend this beautiful hotel Is an experience

column3: Best Staff and Hotel in Marrakesh
column4: It's my fourth visit in Marrakesh and my second stay in M√∂venpick Mansour. I've been traveling around the world and I always like to stay in classy and stylish ho√§tels, and this hotel really really is one of my favorites. Especially the staff here is one of the best I ever experienced. The head of the reception Mrs Laila is definitely my favorite staff member. She always has a smiling face, no matter what I ask for: upgrade for a better room, more service, going to the gym when it's already closed, suggestions where to go for dinner or a to have a drink: she takes her time and she really cares about her guests to have a good time here in Marrakesh at the M√∂venpick Mansour. She really is a total professional. So whenever you need help: ask Mrs Laila. This is arabic‚Ä¶

Amazing massage by Najia. I had the treatment with Najia I like it so much .she is very professional very dedicated .I had o lot of massages but it is the best.I recommend everybody to try a treatment with her.

The hotel has great facilities, tough I couldnt utilise it due to work. Great for families as I could see. Want to extend √† thank you to all the service people as they were all equally great and mohamed imad who is the only one I got the name in the end. Thank you

column3: Amazing stay, thanks to a lady called Hannan
column4: Some initial teething issues (as you would expect from time to time), but I have to say that it was totally made up for thanks to amazing management and certain staff members. In particular, I‚Äôd like to say a big thank you to a lady called Hannan at reception, who truly went over and above to rectify the issues and in fact, more than make up for it! Because of her efforts, the hotel eventually exceeded our expectations. Staff members like her are a real asset to the hotel. That lady really deserves a promotion!! If only I could get staff as switched on and dedicated! Overall a great stay. The resort feels excellent value for money, and is stunning, particularly in the evenings after dark. I also enjoyed the breakfast Would recommend

She was the best. The best treatment I got. She‚Äôs super kind and lovely and takes care of everything. Go to the spa and ask for Najia, you won‚Äôt regret it. Thank you so much for your delicate service.

column3: Visit this hotel, you will LOVE IT!
column4: To help your decision of reading the rest of this review, I will summarise. IT WAS AMAZING! Now, on to the details. When you arrive you will be greeted by a gorgeous lobby and the scent of jasmine flowers, definitely Instagramable. Help yourself to some mint tea if you wish. The check in was quick and efficient and we were soon off to our room which was a garden view. Not the most amazing view but I wouldn't complain. The room is spacious and well equipped. The decor is classically modern with moroccan style oozing from every corner. It has all the essentials you would expect, 24 hour room service, conceirge etc.. it has 3 pools all of which have their own appeal. A lively pool next to a bar and cafe which serves hot stone-baked pizza on demand and then two smaller pools, one‚Ä¶

At the reception you will be welcomed by the most beautiful smile in Marrakech of Hanane and the greatest charme you will find of Othman. You want to exchange money for a good rate? Hanane is your bank. You need anything during your trip? Othman is your advisor. Both made our stay here in marrakech much easier!

Reception: Mohssin has provided us with excellent customer service. He had good communication skills, attentive to all our queries and went beyond our expectations. Kids Club: a special thank you to Touria, Nezha and the girls. They were fantastic, caring and has experience with taking care of the kids. My daughter enjoyed her time at the kids club and wanted to go back everyday. They provide great program where My daughter made pizza, played games, was creative and made a bouquet of roses for me. They take very good care with the kids and ensure that the Kids wash their hands. Breakfast: The breakfast was good and had a good selection of pastries and fruits. It was very busy and did not have enough English breakfast tea bag. The hotel: it was modern very‚Ä¶

The spa is fantastic, the deep tissue massage was excellent, Najia in particular is very very good. Thank you Najia. This is the best massage I have had, very professional. I will definitely come back again. Thank yo Najia for the best treatment.

Had a great massage best I have had in a long time, relaxing and I was asleep in minutes. Very professional services from Najia. I will recommend relaxing massage when you come to M√∂venpick . Thank you Najia for your delicate service.

Good enough location - 10min from the airport + 5/10min from the Medina by Taxi. Overall, very pleasant hotel and good value. Great rooms and very nice breakfast. However... - Staff at reception is extremely slow to take you in charge. Be ready to wait. I mean, patience must be a virtue for you to enjoy that hotel. - The management of the swimming pool is an an absolute disaster. Almost all umbrellas are broken and you wait ages for service. - Half board, it‚Äôs even worst. Quality of the food is good and the staff is nice. But dinner take you ages every single night. Also note this is Spanish restaurant, don‚Äôt expect Morrocan food.

Excellent treatment. Very good massage. I was very enjoying the very good service at the spa bi NAJIAüòç i came every ti spa to get a very professional treatment. NAJIA was the best. I recommend the family and friends to come to this hotel to enjoy the very good hospitality and kindness staff

Very good massage from Iman, and great service from receiption spa Hind. Thank you! Visiting Marrakesh with family and was a great experience. Hotel was very good also with great friendly staff I recommend very highly

We spent 10 days in this magical city. We stayed at the M√∂venpick hotel which is very central to all the amenities in Marrakesh. Our room was very large and the balcony (facing the French consulate) had a large terrace/balcony. The room was immaculate clean and this is all thanks to Salma who took good care of us everyday. We specifically wanted to point this out and had the chance to speak to Amina (in charge of housekeeping) who really seems to have everything under control regarding this important function in a hotel. Salma, you made our stay so pleasant and we are so grateful for all your efforts when coming back to an immaculate clean room every day! We would also like to thank Hassan (the SPA pool) for his great service skills and also Abdelharim at the restaurant for his‚Ä¶

column3: Be warned this is really a conference hotel, not holiday resort
column4: Positives: the hotel was clean, our room was large and well appointed, great breakfast. Location is great as you are out of the bustle of the old medina, but it is v easy to get a cab there - just haggle on price. Negatives: While we were there it was taken over by a huge conference. The main pool was unavailable as it was set up with food stations, so all the loungers were squashed up in the middle pool. The top bar was also reserved for conference attendees. A lot of the loungers were broken, cushions dirty. They were also SO understaffed -this could just be a worldwide problem in hospitality post Covid - but again we think probably because of the conference. The two nights we tried to eat in the hotel only one of the restaurants was open. Don't be fooled by 'Garden‚Ä¶

column3: Nice hotel but not worthy of 5 Stars
column4: Stayed here for 3 nights in May. Hotel has good facilities with very comfortable beds, however the level of customer service is certainly not worthy of 5 stars. Few examples: - Long wait at check in, in excess of 20 minutes not ideal after a long trip in the heat. - Pool staff unwilling to source suncream. - Main pool shut all day while they re-fill with water, surely this can be done at night? Overall the hotel staff lacked attention to detail shown in comparable 5 star resorts.

column3: OK stay‚Ä¶ not sure if it‚Äôs a 5 star hotel
column4: Not really a 5 star hotel. The foyer is amazing and The rooms were nice and clean, but ours had a flickering light that was not fixed despite asking. The check in process took ages l was waiting 45 minutes.. the reception team just looked disorganised and then visibly stressed and a bit rude. They seem to be well staffed, but Mixed levels of services from staff‚Ä¶ some super friendly and on it‚Ä¶ others just standing around chatting and not paying attention to guest so at times took ages to get any service. Breakfast was really good, but the food at dinner time was really bad. I would not recommend.

Very nice view in hotel with 3 swimming pools. Nice place to chill. Highly recommend the restaurant in the hotel, named "Marcalona". Staff here are really nice and helpful, especially my new friend AmalüòÅüòÅ Good gym with a lot of weightlifting equipment and strong trainer. Professional spa with excellent atmosphere. Imane is good at message skills, i would say" must try". It's a fantastic experience in this hotel!üëèüèæüëèüèæ ÈùûÂ∏∏Ê£íÁöÑÈÖíÂ∫óÔºåËÆæÊñΩÈΩêÂÖ®ÔºåÂëòÂ∑•ÈÉΩÈùûÂ∏∏ÁÉ≠ÊÉÖÔºåÊúâ‰ªÄ‰πàÈúÄË¶ÅÔºåÂè™Ë¶ÅÂè´‰∏ÄÂ£∞Â∞±‰ºöÊúâ‰∫∫Êù•‰∫ÜÔºåÂÅ•Ë∫´ÊàøËÆæÂ§áÁÆóÊòØÈÖíÂ∫óÈáåÈùûÂ∏∏ÈΩêÂÖ®ÁöÑ‰∫Ü„ÄÇÂÄºÂæóÂÖ•‰Ωè

The room was large and clean, there is a very nice area around the swimming pool, and the staff were very friendly and helpful, especially Outmane, who took care of my luggage on the first day. Also enjoyed the hotel bar and the adjacent restaurants - excellent food, and - to my surprise - even a local beer called Casablanca, which tastes rather pleasant.

The room was very clean and spacious! The staff was very very friendly! The night person Nadia , was awesome, she was probably the most helpful person and so professional Zakia and bushra were amazing too and of course we can‚Äôt forget Mohammed who also made sure to get everything we needed.definitely going back to this hotel when we visit Marrakech again. Thanks movenpick team from Al nobani family

I have booked this hotel for my parents and I have paid the total amount including taxes through Ctrip. When they were checking out, the hotel stopped them saying that the paiement didn‚Äôt go through and that they couldn‚Äôt leave. I spent almost 2 hours between talking to Ctrip operator and the hotel receptionist because she was claiming that there was an issue with the paiement. In the meantime, she didn‚Äôt want to let my parents leave until the issue gets fixed even though she knows that we already pre-paid the booking. As a 5 stars hotel, I think the least thing they should do it to not include the client in these matters and maybe review and fix their paiements before the check-in or during the stay. Beside that, the receptionist was extremely rude and totally unprofessional. ‚Ä¶

I went to Movenpick on a business trip and I was impressed by this hotel. Excellent hotel and service. The personnel is friendly and very professional. Special thanks to Najia for her dedication and quality of service. Going back to Marrakech I would certainly put Movenpick on top of my list.

I had a wonderful spa experience and a superb treatment by the wonderful NAJIA. I Would highly recommend. Best massage treatment. Very professionally and highly experienced. Great staff and wonderful experience so far.

This was a beautiful hotel. We had the two bedroom suite with walkout patio and it was huge! 4 bathrooms and the living area was so spacious. It felt like an apartment. Closet space for your clothes was amazing! TVs in each room. 3 in total. Upon entering we were greeted by a huge tray of fruit, tray of macaron, chocolate and cookies! Impressive‚Äô! Our suite was Great for families, lots of privacy. The pool area was breathtaking. I cannot express the level of service you receive while here. Mustapha in the breakfast restaurant was the nicest most gracious host. The breakfast buffet was huge and had everything! Said at the front desk was kind and friendly. The lobby area and grounds are clean and groomed perfectly. There is an ATM in the lobby and they also will convert your‚Ä¶

I have loved every thing about my experience, my family and friends were happy as well and excited. I usually don't leave comments however I have to say that Khadijah was more than great she kept asking if everthing was alright and if we needed anything, she's beyond professional and a sweet lady. I'm definitely coming back for both the food and her service.

column3: Good experience for us as a first time in Marrakesh, ond of the best time for my family I def initelyrecommend to ev ery
column4: Top service by Nahima & abderrahim ‚úÖ Very helpful‚úÖ Me and my family super enjoy by the service, the food fresh and tasty, they spoil us big time, The hotel was great good costumers service and very quick response for everything We will come 100%

column3: THE WORST RUN HOTEL I HAVE EVER STAYED IN
column4: The staff were lazy and clueless a typical example of a budget Hotel company trying to go upmarket. we paid extra for a Suite and it had no Air Conditioning so they moved us to another room after arguing for hours, then the new Suite the taps fell off so for two days we couldn‚Äôt shower or bath! eventually they fixed it and it lasted 24 hours until they fell off again and we couldn‚Äôt turn the shower off so the room filled with steam. A NIGHTMARE and no one cared at all, do not stay here there are fantastic Hotels in Marrakech this is NOT one of them

column3: Great stay at the Movenpick Marrakech
column4: We just got back from a 7 night stay at the Movenpick. A great property with excellent facilities. Even when busy - the service was great and the staff very pleasant and helpful at all times. We were particularly impressed at the great service we got from the front desk team - Mohssin and Sohail were brilliant and went out of their way to make sure any questions were quickly addressed. The breakfast was also great, with a wide selection of options. The restaurant staff and particularly Naima were wonderful. Naima is so nice, pleasant and helpful - we looked forward each morning to seeing her. She's a true asset to the hotel. Overall a great stay and we are already planning to return next year. Thanks Movenpick - see you soon.

I train at the Movenpick gym for almost 4 years now! Very professional team and wonderful spaces! Big swimming pool and cool vibes. Special thanks to Coach Amine for making everyday enjoyable and for the wonderful boxing sessions.

The property is stunning, with beautiful fountains and intricate decor. The room was clean and cozy, and had a small patio to enjoy the garden area beside the pool. Most of all, the staff was friendly and accommodating. Especially Laila, who served us at the pool side restaurant. She was attentive and kind and we enjoyed meeting her.

Hotel was excellent again as always, beautiful pool, rooms, surroundings and fitness. Special thanks to Anas who makes sure you are as comfortable as can be by the pool, nothing is too much to ask. And to Abdou the fitness coach eho makes your workout that much interesting üôèüôè

I totally recommend Movenpick while in Marrakesh. The hotel and rooms are comfortable. I wouldn't recommend the buffet, bad food and bad service. Go elsewhere. I would recommend the breakfast however, good food and good service by Mohsive and Licham. If you want this to be a pool holiday however, be warned towels at dawn, limited sun loungers and parasols and plenty of kids to keep the noise level up!

Spending whole the month of April in this great hotel. The location is perfect, the food is perfect (nice iftar buffet) & the client service is great. Thanks to the reception team, the hard working guys at the swimming pool & the Spa team (Fatine & Hind) to make it even more enjoyable!

Read the negative reviews. They are reflecting the truth. Quality if the hotel: The hotel looks amazing from the outside. The lobby is incredibly beautiful. At first sight this continues throughout, but then scratching only very little under the surface you will find that it was extremely poorly maintained. The loungers by the main pool are all broken. Their mattresses seem intact but never cleaned. The day beds once had cloth shades that now are all damages so that only very few even have them and those that do rather resemble little make shift tents than day beds. The number of umbrellas by the pool is very limited and most stands are damaged and not properly maintained. Even in the rooms the toilet seats have scratches. House number 7 is facing a night club and the music‚Ä¶

I would like to thank Amine for his hard work, to raise my limits and keep challenging me, just the right combination of push and encouragement. And very adaptive to the materials and space at hand! Well done, Amine.

column3: Avoid this hotel at all costs
column4: When we arrived the room smelled TERRIBLE like sewage. AC did NOT WORK - the hotels front desk staff was extremely rude to a level where we had to leave the hotel. Disgusting experience and the hotel didn‚Äôt bother to amend the situation. AVOID. We were in room 2317. Expedia wasn‚Äôt helpful either in doing a refund and we stated at la Mamounia instead.

The hotel‚Äôs gym may not have all of the equipment in the world, but it sure has the most attentive staff. Coach Amine is very keen on helping you achieve your goals by devising a workout for you, adjusting your form, and pushing you to your limits. His attitude is always positive and he always brings a smile to your face!

Great location, easy to get in and out of the city. Have never had a bad experience and it‚Äôs right in the heart of city, so you can walk to everything. The staff was wonderful. The hotel is well maintained. The beds were very firm, too firm for my liking. The food was good. I, especially, enjoyed the view of the sunset.

We stayed here for 5 nights in April and extended it because of relaxed atmosphere and location. This is our second visit to Marrakesh first time we stayed in the Medina but chose this time to stay outside and it was a correct decision. The area around Movenpick is calm and open, walking distance to most touristic places. The hotel itself grows on you ; when we first arrived we didn‚Äôt like it and found the staff aloof but soon we started to like it and enjoy. The breakfast at the hotel is excellent and the staff are very helpful; right from Fatima who serves delicious mint tea to chef Walid and Nora who makes good eggs and then Skiriba to name the few made every breakfast morning memorable. We will stay here again when back to Marrakesh.

Mohamed skiriba top 10/10 Very helpful and kind. All staff are very polite and treat everyone with respect. It‚Äôs our second visit to the same hotel and I would definitely be coming back again in future.

I totally recommend Movenpick while in Marrakesh. The hotel and rooms are super comfortable and there are 2 great malls in the neighborhood. Fatima Ezzahra and Amine, from the breakfast team made me and my mom feel like home everyday. Special thanks to them and the amazing concierge that helped us a lot with a hammam reservation.

column3: First time at Movenpick (and Marrakech) and not the last!
column4: This is our first visit to a Movenpick and to Marrakech itself! What is great about the hotel: - Breakfast is great, and the service is amazing! (Shout out to the staff that looked after us - especially Moulay Yousef, Skiriba and Karim!) - Great location, we walked to most restaurants in the evenings - Good sized pool - Good sized rooms - Good bar area, we were able to watch the football - Staff, very helpful and friendly. - Front desk made some great recommendations to local spas. Minor improvement area would be that the hotel could do with some minor updates as you can see some wear and tear. But this is very minor given COVID. So well done to the team for making our stay a memorable one! Best Steve (Room 2302)

This hotel is so amazingly beautiful!! Its very well appointed from top to bottom. If that wasn't enough, the service is peerless. Laila in the pool area was attentive from day 1. I spent lots of time poolside and Laila remembered what food I liked (with additions and substitutions) and my very own concocted drink. Eventually we called the drink "Another One" because that was the way we referred it to it. Would definitely stay here again!!

Staff especially Moulay yousef, skiriba cavalier and karim who greets us in the morning for breakfast are outstanding, making sure we start the day right. Hotel is clean but in some areas like pool could be updated. Try to get room facing the pool area as they tend to get better natural light.

I had such a delightful service with laila this week she was so welcoming and delightful, always with a smile on her face and providing such a great service and made sure me and my wife had the best time ever, I would like to thank her so much she needs a promotion!

column3: The experience in Movenpick hotel Marrakech
column4: Karim -fatimzqhera-skiriba 10/10. Top It‚Äôs my first time in movenpik hotel Marakech it‚Äôs been an amazing experience the room was really clean the service from door to door was just perfect hayat alkkheyat as i have kids she was taking care of my room really well and the team in the morning they give us such an amazing breakfast experiencei

My friend and I thoroughly enjoyed our visit to Movenpick hotel Marrakech! Breakfast was fantastic! Fatima Ezzahra and skiriba and karim were all so so lovely and helpful and made our visit even more enjoyable!! Thanks so much again! Hope to see you again soon!

Mohamed Skiriba and Fathima Dikte have been very hospitable on the trip and treated customers in a warm and kind manner. The pool and dining areas are lovely. The location is about 15 mins from the airport

Moullay yousef and skiriba Cavaliers and karim 10/10 Thank you for an amazing experience at my first day at Mavenpick..had an excellent sleep after a very long time..also the smooth experience through the reception checking process.

The facilities and the lobby area were truly amazing. Breakfast was really great and contains various kinds of food that will satisfy everyone. Special and big thanks to the most amazing staff of Marcelona restaurant: Sukaina, the manager and the rest of the team. We chose to celebrate our Anniversary with them and they did amazing job. It was truly beyond expectations. This night will be memorable for us all the time. We really thank them from the bottom of our hearts. Will definitely come back

column3: Still fantastic and now even better
column4: Re-Opened after the stupid Covid scare that every government fell for (due to media hype), this excellent hotel is back and as terrific as ever. But I wanted to recommend the Spanish restaurant here which I didn't like much beforehand but now has a new chef and is absolutely excellent. Worth a trip if you're not staying here

Great staff very helpful, Naima @ Breakfast was so professional big up to SAAD @ the Bar a wonderful host, was so good on Friday DJ fired up the place, Othman @ the pool was top notch the room was spacious and clean overall an amazing weekend spent in Marrakech with the family will definitely comeback thank you ALL for your kindness

I would definitely recommend staying here. It is well located with a nice variety of restaurants within walking distance. We felt perfectly safe walking after dark. My most important consideration is cleanliness and the hotel is spotless. The breakfast buffet is excellent and I love the espresso/coffee/hot chocolate machines. My espresso was very good. I also appreciate having a robe and slippers. It is things like that which elevate the experience. Some VERY MINOR suggestions to improve. The lighting in the bathroom is not adequate. There is a nice magnifying mirror for makeup/shaving but the light is on the other end of the counter so it is un-usable. Things like hair dryers should be checked and working. The built in was not functioning and they had to bring me 3‚Ä¶

We stayed at the Movenpick for a week mid February and overall we had a good time. There was an issue regarding our rooms when we first arrived but this was quickly resolved by Hanane who was extremely helpful throughout our stay recommending restaurants and places to visit etc. The hotel is located in a lovely area, Hivernage which is just a 5 minute drive from the City Centre, Medina etc. There are a number of restaurants within walking distance from the hotel which are very good, Le 6, Dameh and Dar Rhizlane, we always felt safe walking to and from the restaurants in the early evening. We ate at the Spanish Restaurant in the hotel on our last evening and I have to say we were very disappointed. We live in Spain for 6 months of the year and it was possibly the worst‚Ä¶

This has become my favorite hotel. The more I come here, the more I appreciate it. It really is a pearl and that‚Äôs because of the staff. I would like to put Hanane from the reception in the spotlight. What a great and wonderfull young lady. So warm, so helpful and very professional. Every hotel dreams of such a colleague in their team. She was there for us every day when we booked an extra day. Every time with a big smile and asking how we were doing and if we need something. Once you're here you don‚Äôt want to leave and that's because of the staff. Thank you Hanane, you are the sunshine of the hotel. We will leave in a few days but I‚Äôll be back very soon!!

It is very good to spend vacation in this hotel Good behavior by the staff. Hanane from the reception is very kind and friendly. Thans oui for your help. And I like to mention the brilliant waitress, Jihan, who treated us comfortably I recommend you to spend your holidays in this hotel.

We stayed at the Movenpick over the kids half term holiday and upon check in, the staff were so welcoming and we were given an upgrade, which was unbelievably kind! It was without a doubt, the nicest room we have ever stayed in. The lifeguard at the pool was so helpful in getting sun loungers and towels ready for the day in the sun by the pool. All of the waiters by the pool were great too. Breakfasts were lovely with fresh orange juice, eggs made to order and plenty of options for the kids. The interior design of the hotel is beautiful, with so many areas to relax and take in the surroundings. Would highly recommend, we had a wonderful stay.

This is our second time here. Excellent experience. The location is very good. The staff is professional. Moulay Youssef the manager est exceptionally good and caring. Everyone is smiling and helpful. The breakfast is d√©licieux and varied. The rooms are cozy and spacious.

Excellent service by Laila and Mohammad from the reception, good prices, amazing hotel and perfekt location in Marrakech. Thank you Laila and Mohammad for your help and the best service you have give us.

Staff was attentive and Accommodating. The rooms were clean the food was great the service was awesome!  Amal The supervisor or manager of the spa and fitness is very professional,and I would like to thank coach Amine for the amazing welcome and help for this wonderful time that i had.I absolutely loved everything about the Movenpick hotel!

We went to eat breakfast and there was a great waiter . He really was there for us when we needed anything. Thank you to him because he is a very helpful waiter and he‚Äôs there anytime. Always there to make you comfortable.

I was visiting Marrakech and decided to try the gym available at the hotel. Coach Amine is very friendly and motivated me throughout the whole week to achieve my goals. I highly recommend him, thanks.

I had the most amazing time at the Movenpick hotel, the hotel is beautiful and clean and the staff are very polite and friendly. My stay and experience in Marrakech and Movenpick hotel was incredible by the help of Douaa who works as a Co-ordinator at the hotel, very professional and helpful.

column3: Lovely hotel in the heart of the Historical city Merrakech
column4: Very beautiful and clean hotel , friendly and attentive staff, delicious food (especially a La carte restaurants) our favourites Moroccan gastronomic dishes fresh and yummy from a La carte. There are a quiet pool area which is very nice with green zone surrounded by a beautiful Moroccan architecture, In this hotel you can choose what kind of energy you want once you try to relax . Great staff especially from FB department, by theway I would liketo thank Mr.Jawad and his team ( Marcellona restaurant) always are welcoming us with a stunning smile , professionalism way and attentive with all guests . Lots a very nice sitying areas where you can just simlpy relax with a drink in your hand.

the hotel is in a great location and great service as I go there to work and relax where i eat some fabulous food in Marcello restaurant where the staff recognise me and feel like home. So thank you again for your great hospitality to the staff and their manager is so helpful and speak great english and his staff.Have great holidays and see you soon i hope.

I was very satisfed of the experience of movenpick. The room was incredible . The service on top. Good job ! I will return soon. Special thank to the beautiful lady in Hr Mss Douaa . Thank you for everything.

The whole stff were amaizing service 100‚ÑÖ clean hotel with a lot of activities thanks to souhail and laila who wre there taking care of us and give us informations about marrakech city that i loved so much We will come back again and we will be many not only 4 people.

Skiriba and fatimezhera Are very good person they help me in my vacation And I will thank him for this Enth the welcoming of najoua enth the beak fast is very amazing I like my friends skiriba enth fatima is my best weater,s in morroco

We spent three wonderful night , clean rooms ,tasty and fresh breakfast , kids club is really good they take care of children from 10 Am to 6pm wonderful team . Definetly i will come and visit again. Its worth it .

What a beautiful and relaxing hotel this is. I've been coming here a number of times now for the last months and I keep coming back. I really feel at home here and relaxed. Special thanks goes to Mustafa at the breakfast buffet. A very nice and friendly man who comes by every time to ask if you need anything. A real family man who wants to please everyone. Very very professional and always ready for the guests with a smile. He told me he works there for almost 30 years, het doing his job with so much passion. This kind of staff is really worth its weight in gold. The staff are just really great. The interaction with each other as colleagues is very professional and pleasant. Just like a family. This makes the atmosphere in the hotel very warm and welcome. They go out of their‚Ä¶

column3: "Excellent Hotel at very good location with excellent service"
column4: The M√∂venpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi Marrakech is a beautiful hotel with an excellent location at Hivernage. The whole staff is very professional and friendly from the moment you arrive until you left. I have been upgraded for which my special thanks. Very special thanks, to Mrs. Nada Zouhair for her welcome and professionalism each time, who is always very reachable to help us with most extraordinary attention. The suites are spacious and the housekeeping is focused on cleanliness. During this Covid period, the hotel take all the necessary measures to protect the guests at the hotel. During the breakfast, each table was equipped with its own disinfection product, something that other 5 star hotels do not immediately do. Well appreciated and thank you for all the efforts in‚Ä¶

column3: Our second visit and we certainly will come back
column4: This was our second visit as we decided to scape to the sunny weather where hospitality is important. We had again a great experience above our expectations. The hotel has all the right installations to keep you inside. The team is very friendly and you feel very welcome. Jamra Restaurant next to the pool offer a healthy menu w/o gluten and lactose presenting a very balanced menu. Marcelona brasserie is a great choice for dinner. The SPA is open during long hours with free access to Jacuzzi, Hammam and Sauna, upon reservation, the staff is very kind and treatments are recommended, they use local products, reserve your massage on time! Thank you to Dauaa, Amel, Kamir, Chef Ahmed & Chef Tariq. We look forward to come back soon.

Great hotel, amazing gym and staff (coach Abdul and Neama in particular), I would highly recommend to any travellers to Marrakesh. Good gym machines and programmes too. Very beautiful hotel overall and good prices with loveholidays

I really enjoyed the customer service and the confort of the hotel from Hanane,Amal,Jawed and coach Amine. From the time I entered until I left, I had nothing but positive experience. The check in process was fast and easy. The pool was amazing. The food was great; the servers were wonderful. The hotel is well situated and near a mall and some restaurants. You will have a great time at this hotel especially if you are traveling with family. I highly recommend and will definitely be staying there again.

column3: Movenpick Marrakesh is TRULY the best!
column4: My husband, friends and I enjoyed yet another stay at the very beautiful Marrakech Movenpick hotel. The decor, grounds, ambience and service is uniquely beautiful and very well kept and maintained. The hotel is very well located near the airport as well as in close access to the city center and easy access to transportation., the mall, fabulous restaurants etc. The breakfast buffet was excellent. Shout out to OMAR for his consistent, courteous and OUTSTANDING service. The Spanish restaurant, Marcelona was also exceptionally nice. KHADIJA made sure that our two dinners there were superb experiences Shout out to the beautiful and very professional staff at the front desk - HANANE, HIND, LAILA, SAID, NADIA etc. They went OUT of their way to accommodate us and welcomed us back‚Ä¶

it was a very good experience in this hotel , the restaurant is perfect ( delicious food , professional and friendly staff , especially MR jawed , beautiful and comfortabl erooms ) , lot of good things .... we also loved our tour guid who was punctual , patient , sensitive and multilingual, he shared with us his knowledge in engaging , interactive and entertaining way , wish made us enjoying the tour . we recommend the bad thing in our experience : in front of the hotel exactly near the fountain , we couldn't smoke a cigarette and make conversation for moment alone , There was more than 5 stranger around us , we felt uncomfortable !!!!

Excellent gym, very satisfied of the staff especially the new coach Amine who is very helpful, pleasant and full of energy. I joined the gym in June and I'm happy I did. Everyone is very polite and hepful. In addition, I get 20% of the services at the spa :)

I had a great experience in this very nice hotel. The service and location are ideal ! All the employees are very welcoming, helpful and professional, with a special mention to the very friendly receptionist Mohsine who was very helpful and kind. I will not hesitate to come back to this hotel with my family or friends.

The room service is amazing, food and service is outstanding! We stayed in a delux room, which was perfect for me, my wife and our baby. The pools are beautiful, but cold. Service at the pool is average. Restaurant is okay, but room service has better food. Spa was nice too, and Bouchra was great!! Overall, an awesome experience. We will come back

Spa- I had one of the best spa experiences at the Movenpick hotel spa. The hammam bath done by Hind left my skin soft as a you know what and the massage and pedicure by Najja was relaxing. These ladies were professional and went out their way to make me comfortable. If you stay at this hotel please check the spa out

Really enjoyed the stay. Hind from recepon and Buchra from guest relations were outstanding. Staff great in general. Surely would recommend. Breakfast was not bad but could be improved. Room was very clean. Location convenient.

column3: Warm welcome to Movenpick at Check in and Marcelona
column4: Arrived last night for a third visit to Movenpick Marrakech and received such a warm welcome at check in from Hanone, Laila, Hind, Said and the entire team. What a wonderful team of people with a strong culture of hospitality. They went out of their way in every respect and we are truly impressed by their consistent service. We had dinner at Marcelona and Khadija continued the welcome with her courteous and attentive service, providing us a very satisfying dining experience. The food was outstanding as was our lovely server and we look forward to returning later in the week. We ordered fried anchovies, paella and Sea Bass and everything was tasty and well presented. Thank you to the entire team!

Firstly no words will be enough to explain how satisfied l am with their services. Hotel is close to malls, taxi, restaurant. Everything me from front desk to the kitchen were great. Breakfast is the best l have ever had. pool is clean. Hind was amazing : good listener, extended my stay each time l asked. Had no issue.

Our 5 days at the Movenpick Marrakech were absolutely amazing . The hotel is very big and gorgeous as we wanted. We were so happy to wake up there every morning . The pictures on internet do not show all the beauty of it as we were absolutely WOWed by it when we arrived and saw it in real life. It has got a good location, lovely restaurants, 3 pools and a spa . The service was top class. We felt like celebs. The breakfast was really good, big choice and stuff was helpful. I want to thank Nezha at the reception as she was extremely kind and helpful and upgraded us straight away for a lovely room with a terrace and a nice view for my partner‚Äôs 30th birthday. We also received a nice cake to our room for the same reason which was lovely. At the SPA I would like to thank Najia‚Ä¶

We had a wonderful time at the Movenpick! Gorgeous grounds! The staff were very friendly. Make sure you check out the quiet pool behind El Medhi. Thank you to Hanane and Nezha for the wonderful service!

The hammam experience from Himd was fantastic and relaxing. The massage and manicure from Fatine was also wonderfully fantastic. The prices were higher than I'd like to spend considering the facilities, but that's what these type of hotels tend to charge. Regardless of my comments, I left the spa feeling incredibly relaxed and refreshed. I highly recommend.

There were elements of this hotel which were disappointing - it‚Äôs massively overpriced for food and drink, only 1 out of 4 restaurants were open and it was not a good restaurant for a vegetarian!, despite it being advertised as an English speaking hotel we actually found very few staff spoke English, and breakfast was hit and miss- sometimes they would have certain items, other mornings they wouldn‚Äôt. BUT. The location was excellent. The room was beautiful and immaculately clean. The lobby/foyer was magnificently decadent. The pool staff were lovely and very attentive. The spa was great, staff were friendly and we had very relaxing treatments. Would stay here again but knowing we must eat out at restaurants rather than expecting to eat in the hotel.

column3: A Movenpick standard despite a disappointing breakfast
column4: Not a big fan of this kind of hotel. No surprise at least. Breakfast is below average and the Spanish restaurant is overpriced. The rest is OK. It would need some refurbishment but location is nice and staff is helpful. The trim we had lacked of natural daylight but all amenities were not ok.

column3: I visited the holtel twice this summer
column4: I honestly was blown away, the hotel is amazing it has a great pool I was also impressed by the stuff they had a manager called Saad i gues he was so friendly and made sure that we got all we needed Thank you see you next summer

we were at the movenpick hotel in marrakech it's been three days to just see the hotel or drink something thanks to hanane from the reception who offered us a good price and showed us a beautiful room in the Mamoun building with a garden view, we took two nights at the hotel hanane helped us with several other requests I would like to thank her for her quality service and I recommend her service 100% hanane see you soon

column3: We checked in the receptionist her name is Hanane gave us wrong rooms
column4: The receptionist Hanane was an unprofessional person we told her to give us rooms we've booked which are with a pool view and king bed rooms apparently she gave it to other guests! So she is a very bad image&reputation for a five stars hotel! Thank God Laila was such a sweetheart,professional and so kind and helpful. Otherwise the hotel overall is a very nice hotel all staff were lovely. Would definitely come back to meet persons like Laila at the reception and others but Hanane should at least get a warn from her manager so she doesn't do the same mistake with other guests! Thank you Movenpick well come back soon!:)

column3: Very nice clean hotel friendly people nice breakfast and good service congratulations to the management of the hotel!!!!
column4: I spend 1 night in this hotel this hotel Is very nice!! The reception people where so good they were so excited to see us it felt like coming home Mrs Hanane and Mrs Hind were so kind and polite and also Mr Said. Thank you guys very much for a nice stay.

The service was great. Our stay at the M√∂venpick Hotel Mansour Eddahbi Marrakech was fantastic. We enjoyed our visit and will come back for sure. We highly recommend it to everybody because the manager Boushra will make sure that you will not forget your visit!!

A great place to stay in Marrakech. This is a palatial property with beautiful well kept gardens and large and comfortable rooms in several buildings. As Accor Gold member was upgraded to a Deluxe room at check in. Room was huge with a large balcony, that was great for either relaxing or dining on, large bathroom with double basins, huge walk in closet and Nespresso Machine. All the staff we met were friendly and attentive, especially the restaurant and bar staff. Despite the Covid situation and 9pm curfew, the hotel does its best to serve an excellent buffet breakfast and all day meals and drinks by the pool. I particularly liked the spectacular lobby, the gardens filled with olive trees. rosemary and lavender, the bathroom amenities and the wonderful breakfast, enjoyed‚Ä¶

It was a wonderful 4hand massage with fatin and bouchra witch i highly recomendI i feel reborn and totaly relaxed and the spa recepsionist hind was so kind and very profesionel best hotel in marrech thanks

column3: Always a pleasure going back to Movenpick
column4: I always enjoy staying in this hotel as it s close to everything the staff are fabulous and the food in Marcelona is fantastic. They always remember their clients and their preference s and allergies so thank you again for the team and Jawad the manager of Marcelona

We came for the first time to marrakech and we didn't was dispointed for choosing movenpick .we really appreciate the good service specially the spa I did a very relaxant massage with Bouchar and I thanks the spa receptionist hind for the warm welcoming and the best assisting .

We stayed here for 2 nights as a family of four, we arrived early for check in at 12pm we were first greeted with Moroccan green tea which was delicious and much needed from the 47c heat outside! We checked in and within 15 minutes we were taken to our room and shown were breakfast the pools and kids clubs were. We chose to stay in a Prestige Suite and wow we were blown away by the size of the room, the modern clean decor. The suite has a large living, washroom, bedroom with a walk in closet and a huge bathroom with a lovely bath in the middle and separate shower and toilet. The balcony had both a relax sitting area and dinning area. This has to be the best room we have ever stayed in! We really didn't want to leave the room! As it was my birthday the room was decorated‚Ä¶

We simply love the Movenpick hotel here in Marrakech and we would not choose any other hotel. We travel to Marrakech for our business regularly, twice a month on average and we always stay at the Movenpick. The hotel is conveniently located, being around 10 minutes from the airport, 10 minutes from Gueliz (the shopping area) and around 15mins to the main market square. The hotel is beautiful, as soon as you pull up to the entrance you can see the lovely architecture of the hotel whilst being greeted by the door staff and a Moroccan tea. As you walk through the foyer you feel a sense of tranquility and calmness, as the flowing water features in the hotel bring you peace. We'd like to make a special mention to the wonderful staff at the front desk, namely Leyla and Hanane, both‚Ä¶

Stayed at the hotel for 1 week, very good customer service at reception especially Hind who was really helpful and went the extra mile. Munir collected our luggage and always happy to assist. Anas on the pool side was extremely friendly. Hotel management need to consider providing umbrellas on pool side as not sufficient available. This is basis items that should be available for customers to enjoy and relax at the pool. Would highly recommend hotel and in good area.

Best hotel ever ! This was our second time visiting this beautiful hotel. The service is allways on top. And the staff is very helpful and nice . We have 2 children, and therefor we are allso very very excited for the KIDS CLUB. My children loves it ! And they have a full program for the kids everyday ! The kids in the club and the parents at the pool ! What‚Äôs not to like ! A huge thanks to the staff at the kids club, for taking care of our children so good ( special thanks to TOURIA ) thank you all team m√∂venpick

Shout-Out to the crew working in the bar, Mohamed, Jihane & Hamza, very professionnal, quality service & great spirit ! And a very special shout-out, to the best Duty Manager, Douaa, for the great hospitality, keep shining & smiling, and we will come back for sure !!

I would like to thanks the kids club departement for there kind and nice attitude with my kids, they make my stay into the hotel very comfy üòÄ they very professional and they are carrying about the kids thanks one more time to the kids club team Regards Lujain&Aksel parents

A peaceful and beautiful hotel with quality amenities and a strict respect of covid 19 precautions. The staff is caring and very helpful. Thank you for making us feel like at home, we‚Äôll be back soon :)

It was a really nice experience visiting the movenpick marrakech everything was on top; the staff, the emplacement, the equipments, there was so many pools, a fitness spot, and a great breakfast for all the tastes so many choices there! Me and my fam enjoyed every moment there, I want to thank everyone for the welcoming! So With no doubt I recommend this placeüëçüèªüå∏

La Movenpick is not only a beautiful hotel but also comes with amazing staff as well. Ms. Hind, at the front desk, was the first person to formally welcome us and she is amazing! She was so patient and helpful when answering all of our questions. My boyfriend told her it was my birthday, and she made sure we were given the best service. You can tell she puts forth a lot of effort to make sure guests enjoy their stay. Our room was beautiful and so clean. I hardly write reviews but I also don‚Äôt want anyone to overlook this hotel.

This is a great hotel, as a previous post says it truly has "mind blowing customer service". I would like to thank ALL the staff, especially Laila at the front desk she was the first person to formally speak to us when we arrived and she made sure to help us with all the questions we had and ensured a speedy check in which we greatly needed as it was a long flight and we just wanted to go to our room and rest.

column3: Worst experience in all Accor hotels
column4: My worst experience in all movenpick hotels as well as ALL accor hotels. The lady in the reception her name is Hind was too rude with zero hospitality skills and not even smiling. I asked for my usual upgrade as gold accor member and she refused. She was so impolite and she didn't even provide the welcome drink that is granted for accor members worldwide.

Having visited many Marrakesh‚Äôs hotels for the past two decades, i have to admit that M√∂vempick staff are amongst some of the finest in the city. Particularly Miss Hind and Mr Mohssin, those two lovely front desk assistants are second to none. Nothing was too much for them and going the extra mile seemed to be a natural way of doing things. As a Moroccan myself, i am used to the kindness and hospitality of my people but those two surely have surpassed the national average of kindness. Thank you very much from the bottom of my heart. Allah, Al Watan, Al Malik. ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüá≤üá¶

This is my 5th time to stay at Movenbic Marrakesh..with greatest thanks and appreciation to Miss Hanan at the reception for great service and making me feel at home. The entire hotel staff and services personnel are great help and made my stay most enjoyable with their greetings and smiles . Strongly recommended ...it will always be my place to stay in Marrakech . Eid Mubarak to All.

This is the second time we have booked at Movenpick in a 3 week period. The first time we met Laila she was amazing, took care of us super friendly and made us feel very welcomed. The amenities in the hotel is fantastic btw. For our second booking here we were lucky enough to see her again. It felt like coming home and seeing family. She is truly an asset to this hotel and made our stay very enjoyable. From booking the same room, remembering our names, offering to sort out our covid tests and much more. Thank you Laila, you really made Marrakech memorable and because of you we will always be choosing Movenpick when we are in Marrakech in the future.

My wife and i came in marrakech to get way and Our stay was perfect! The hotel is very beautifull, the pool is good place to relax. The service from Leila, Hohssin, mohammed was incrdible! I would return without hesitation! They aldo reserve an hot air ballon excursion!

I am short of words to describe our stay. It was a great experience. The hotel, location and staff were all 10 out of 10. I would like to thank Hanane and Nadia from the front desk for the excellent service and Mustapha from the breakfast. We felt like royalty.

It was a amazing stay. Lots of fun, service and everything was clean. Speciale thanks to Naima who made every breakfast a speciale one. Swimming pools where really clean and are every day cleaned by the host!

This hotel and service was phenomenal. I ended up staying a few extra days. The staff are very friendly and helpful, won‚Äôt left me lift a finger to get my luggage, the property was nice and clean, the room was beautiful and I enjoyed sitting on the patio. The breakfast bar had everything you could think of and was included in the nightly rate. They even allowed me to do my photoshoot on the property. This was my first visit to Africa. WiFi works great. Definitely recommended.

This is an amazing property! The customer service is awesome. Great service from the front desk staff Driss and Hanane. I had a group of 19 Americans with me and they loved this hotel and the pool!!!!

This hotel is very nice in all facilities and actually it was my 4th times spending vacation here. Staffs are so friendly.And I wanna give credit to Mr. Skiriba who assist us in breakfast buffet,also to the room attendant who assign in room#6107(dated May 13 to May 16, 2021) I really forgot to ask her name but she's really nice and doing her job very well.I'm looking forward to visit again next vacation üòäthank you to all the staff and the management of the hotel.

Staff was attentive and Accommodating. The rooms were clean the food was great the service was awesome! The supervisor or manager of the restaurant made sure there was something for me to eat because there was nothing on the menu that I wanted. I asked for steak, mashed potatoes and vegetables and it was delicious

Absolutely satisfied with everything. Madam Hind was very helpful, answered all my questions and was very welcome.. The hotel looks very nice and I‚Äôm definitely happy with the number of different activities. Definitely satisfied and like the experience!

column3: Exceptional place, great service in beautiful grounds
column4: I can't thank enough the staff for their great service and for keeping the place in such an outstanding condition. The staff at the kids club does a great job keeping the young ones entertained the entire day. It's a perfect spot for a vacation, will definitely stay there again.

Beautiful hotel feels like a little paradise. The design and architecture is really breath taking. The staff is overall really nice, amazing service especially from Naima! Beautiful energy, personality and extremely helpful.

Very nice hotel. Professional helpful staff (especially thx to Lella on reception). Very tasty breakfast and nice dinner. Big beautiful green territory with 3 heating swimming pools. The rooms are good furnished.

column3: You must stay here when visiting Marrakech!!!
column4: This place was beyond amazing! There are soo many facets to discuss on why you need to stay here when you come to Marrakech. First, you are welcomed by the most stunning property with luscious gardens ample space to relax and multiple pools to enjoy. The location of the hotel is excellent as well close to the hustle and bustle of the medina, but not too close that you can have time to relax and get away from the craziness. What really sets this hotel apart is the staff. The staff, every single one of them accommodated us almost as we were their own family. A special thank you to Nezha, Abdellatif, and Mr.Khalid from the front desk and Mr.Omar from the restaurant they went beyond our wildest expectations. Throwing us a party with a cake when they found out there was a graduation‚Ä¶

Movenpick is like an oasis you return to after a busy day. Leila checked us in at reception, and from our fantastic interaction with her on our first day, my husband and I knew we would love our stay. The staff is exceptionally nice and friendly. The dinner at the restaurant was so incredibly delicious. The hammam spa and massage was everything I wanted after our trip to the desert. There are touches all around our room that made us feel like we were at home away from home. And finally, the safety measures instilled in light of COVID, from the hand sanitizers all around the hotel common areas to the small bottles provided for each guest‚Äôs personal use, made me feel safe to stay here during a pandemic. The next time my husband and I visit Marrakech, we will definitely come here‚Ä¶

This hotel is absolutely stunning. The architecture, the details in the design makes this hotel remarkable. When you first arrive your pleasantly greeted by remarkable receptionists. I had the honor to be check in by Hind. Her professionalism, grace and ability to accommodate my needs truly left a smile on my face. The suites are so luxe and sophisticatedly designed. I also appreciated that the room service and the dinning accommodating the Ramadan time schedule. You won‚Äôt regret staying here and you are certainly in good hands if Hind is your receptionist.

My stay was excellent because of the amazing staff. also the people in restaurant and room service go above and beyond. The hotel itself needs a little upgrade and they need more choice for breakfast, it was a little struggle with the choice : more cheeses, more cooked potatoes. The location of the hotel is in the new city but we walked daily to the old city Medina which took about thirty minutes. We tried out the gym and it had all the equipments to do an intense workout. I would definitely stay at this hotel again! The dessert place opposite the hotel is a must place to visit as well!

Just want to say thank you to everyone at the movenpick, from nousra at the front desk, the fantastic and very accomodating chef, the staff in the kids club. My husband and I, had a fantastic stay at the hotel as did our two small children. The hotel has maintained its high standards and hospitality despite the recent global issues. It is a perfect location from couples young and old, families or singles. So close to all the local amenities and the staff by the door are always on hand to help. Highly highly recommend we didn't want to leave. Hope to see you all again soon.

Everything at Movenpick Marrakech is perfection from start to finish. From the moment you set foot in the door, you are treated like what I can only describe as royalty, yet without pretention. I have stayed at this hotel looking for a rest after a big period of stress at work, and it was a great choice for a total relax. Big thank to Hanane for everything.

Moustafa khoukh is a very enthusiastic and good person who works very hard since my tine here I‚Äôve been very pleased and felt very comfortable and so is Oumaima a very hard worker and a kind employee as well

column3: Two-night business stay at M√∂venpick Mansour Eddahbi
column4: We had a two night stay at M√∂venpick Mansour Eddahbi during our business trip to Marrakech and we found the hotel to be pleasant. During our check in, we were welcomed by lovely Ms. Hanane at the reception who helped us with everything we asked for. The rooms are large, newly renovated, and though missing some amenities the exceptionally large marble bathroom and the well kept hotel grounds made up for it. Our stay was during the Covid pandemic and the hotel had plenty of hand sanitizing stations scattered generously both indoor and outdoors. All the hotel staff wore masks and the restaurant had signs on the floor and barriers to keep guests at a safe distance from each other. Greetings and many thanks to Ms. Hanane at the front desk for helping us with great kindness and‚Ä¶

column3: Great service in the challenging time of Covid19
column4: I am writing this review while still staying at the hotel, because I was simply amazed by the service quality. From check in to cleaning to restauration, all staff are respecting the hotel and gov. sanitary instructions. At breakfast this morning, all tables were continuously cleaned and disinfected after every use. Staff were wearing masks properly, and providing amazing support to guests. Special thank you to Mrs.Naima who took very good care of us, always there to help and support. Big thank you to the director of accommodation for his special attention offering us free drinks delivered to our room.

We were truly impressed with the friendliness of staff and their professionalism. The receptionist was great and made us feel truly welcome and went the extra mile to decorate our room as we were newly wed. The spa was brilliant,we had a hamam and massage which were truly great and up to our expectations. All the ladies working there were fab, friendly and professional. The massage therapist Khadija has magical fingers. We had little escape in the spa. Overall, rooms,restaurants, spa are nothing but amazing and true value for money.

Great moment and great hotel.amazing service.laila at piscine and restaurants was probably the most friendly and helpful. We would definitely stay again.the breakfast was amazing also.good staff good food .everything amazing

We spent 3 beautiful days where we enjoyed the pool and its amenities, the service was great with all safety measures and we had some amazing food in the Italian restaurant where Jawad the manager took great care of us so thank you and your amazing staff for making us feel safe and home. We will be back very soon

Massage with Bouchra is a must try ! Amazing hands, wish I could get her massages everyday ! ü§© back massage, hammam gommage, definitely you should do them with her! Love her service, super relaxing and nice !!

Move Move Move As the name implies, would "move" to another choice ‚Äúpick.‚Äù The Sofitel (new wing) in Hivernage was quite nice on a prior visit Positives + has amenities + newer hotel Negatives - this was an industrial-strength hotel and was generally poorly serviced - generally there is a taxi-racket where they all try to set an irrational fixed-price for tourists; you can find the normally priced taxis (after haggling), but need to walk a few hundred feet up the block - not very close to the city center - broken bed slanting to the side - breakfast buffet had low food quality and was a zoo; no service even though hundreds of staff members running around - very strange layout - staff are unhappy but also appear fearful due to lack of employment opportunities in Marrakech

We stayed in December the hotel is what you would expect from a 5 star, lovely grounds, pool and rooms. The customer service is second to none especially receptionist hanane who helped us so much Thanks very much for a pleasant stay

I would like to leave this review for the amazing service i received from Hanane during the duration of my stay. She was polite, very efficient, made checking into my rooms painless and always had a smile on her face! Great service, great staff, awesome hotel.

It‚Äôs 7:06 Am and I can‚Äôt sleep because the hotel reception is claiming that there is no A/C. He claims that the system is only used for heating. I can‚Äôt sleep and I hope that the hotel management checks call records or who is on duty today during this time because this doesn‚Äôt make sense at all. After several calls he said that he will send someone however, I have been waiting and they don‚Äôt answer the calls anymore. I am sitting outside because of the heat.

column3: Om Yoga Studio, a heartwearming experience
column4: The Om Yoga Studio situated by the poolside at the hotel culminates an experience of diversity, dynamism, and mindfulness. Its courses are guided by wonderful, lurid teachers who provide an encouraging and fun platform for people to step forward and simply release. Kamil and Mourad are a sincere delight to be accompanied by in their whimsical ways of guiding their respected courses ! Great people, and great catalog of activity choices - The Bungee course in particular, led by Mourad, offers a different experience compared to the yoga courses - a fun approach to fitness that leaves you looking forward to the next session. The inner child finds its home at Om Yoga Studio, thank you for the wonderful time.

I was delighted by the hotel and the quality of the yoga studio inside, especially the bungee course with Mourad ,he‚Äôs so nice with everybody and always helpful ,I will definitely go in his course and recommend it !

There is no doubt this hotel is beautiful but for the amount of money I paid, it was sub-par. First, do not book any excursions through this hotel. I booked an excursion through them and paid more than booking through the tour company. They scam you into booking tours and excursions with them and take a huge cut. Honestly, don't use the hotel. Second, the staff is lazy and rude! The bell boys stand around watching people and talking. When we asked for directions to the square, the guy was so vague and nonchalant. He told us it was a 10 minute walk... It is not! The man at the Chocolate Hour asked me if I was staying at the hotel while I was helping myself. Excuse me? The worst was when the AC didn't work at night. My mom couldn't breathe and it was like a sauna! We called‚Ä¶

This hotel has one of the nicest group of staff in the entire world. It is a large hotel consisting of about 7 buildings. I was on a Gate 1 tour and decided to forego the optional tours that evening. Was so happy I did because I was able to use the spa and hot tub free of charge and had an amazing dinner at the poolside restaurant. I remember this hotel because it smelled of roses and then we saw these massive vases of red roses.

column3: Superb hotel with all the amenities
column4: We were here with a Gate One tour group. The hotel was much more comfortable and accommodating than the Kenzi Tower Hotel in Casablanca. The lobby was incredibly well decorated and spacious with usually a local musician or mint tea stand somewhere. Breakfast was excellent. We loved the outdoor tapas bar where about 15 of us congregated one evening. Rooms were spacious and hads everything you could possibly need. The staff of course was super cordial and helful.

One of the best spa treatments I've had in a while. The staff was supper attentive and the price was great. I recommend you ask for Asma she was very experienced and gave me a great massage. I look forward to another one before my trip ends

We spent me and my wife an unforgettable night at the Hotel Movenpick Marrakech for the first time to celebrate our wedding anniversary. It was overall the best hotel experience we ever had so far. i really recommend this hotel. The design is very unique. Rooms are very comfortable with all the facilities. Swimming pool & Fitness center are exceptional food is amazing and the staf are very nice and attentive. We were greeted by a young and adorable young lady named Hind at the Reception, she made us a quick check in and the gentleman who served us tea with Moroccan pastry was also friendly. We were surprised by a beautiful decoration from the entrance of the bedroom and bathroom, I thank all the ladies very much: Nezha and Leila from the Reception, Mchmachi, salma and‚Ä¶

We came same time last year we liked so much we came back again . Peaceful,safe,clean and not rowdy and not too far from the main medina only a short taxi ride away. Staff here are exceptional always smiling. It was nice that some of the staff remembered us from last year but there was one member of staff that stood head and shoulders above everyone else and that was Laila what an asset she is to this hotel. We had a slight issue with one of the rooms and she had it resolved instantly. We really love marrakech and we'll be back next year and we'll only be staying here . Thankyou Laila and the rest of the staff . Au revoir

Asma was amazing. Very comforting, very accommodating. Best 1-hour massage in Marrakech. I will definitely be coming back and will do more than just the one hour relaxing massage. Asma was very professional.

We were warmly greeted to the hotel by Nezlah and Abdullah who kindly assisted us with finding a room according to our preferences. The hotel is very grand and beautiful with all the facilities that one requires. Breakfast was delicious with very friendly chefs. However, it would have been nice with a larger selection of fresh fruits instead of canned. We enjoyed the interaction with the bar manager Mohammed who provided us with some nice local recommendations. Our most memorable meal in the hotel was at the Urban Brassiere where we were looked after by Mahmoud who was truly fantastic. He was friendly, professional and understood our needs. Moreover, the food was delicious. We did struggle a bit with the speed of the service when it came to requests to be delivered to our‚Ä¶

I had arranged pick-up from airport with travel agent, arrived at hotel easily but had to wait for check in some time, because guests in front of me with special requests took all their (and my) time. But concierge with luggage was extremely friendly and helpful. The resort style hotel has very nice appearance, some swimming pools, restaurants, bar,... and also with several wall paintings, partly in Banksy-style. Quite nice here... The longer I stood the less guests were here - due to Corona tourism is suffering from cancellations... My room was very quiet and nice. I left my golf bag at concierge for daily picking it up and restoring later (Golfing was my main reason to come to Marrakesh). At end I asked for a late check-out, which was no problem, Mohamed from reception helped‚Ä¶

I had graet time in movenpick hotel espically at manso bar. All bar team are friendly, starting up with Jihan and end up with dj Without forgetting Saad (the bar manager) .also i want to thank Marcelona team (the restorant) for their hospitality .

I absolutely loved everything about the Movenpick hotel! I was travelling solo so was a little worried that I would be bored at times, however, the Movenpick hotel staff are excellent - extremely polite, always smiling, attentive and made my stay a magical experience! I would especially like to thank the Jamra restaurant manager Youssef who made sure that I was having a wonderful time at the quiet pool! The restaurant serves delicious healthy food which is brought to you whilst you‚Äôre relaxing in the sun. Thank you for taking such great care of me! The hotel rooms are spacious and cleaned every day by very friendly ladies. Even on Women‚Äôs day they have thought to put a little rose in the bedroom. The breakfast was delicious offering freshly made Moroccan pancakes, omelettes,‚Ä¶

It's like the first time that i visit this hotel and it was so nice place the view the buffet was good all the waitresses ,in the bar are helpful and i would like to thank sara and jihane for the amazing welcome and also her manger saad for this wonderful time that i had

Hotel location is great, but my experience with staff at reception rather poor. Same with staff at morning coffee. Pool restaurant should have better card, some more cold dishes, not only pizza. Missed a restaurant with local dishes.

column3: The perfect spot to do it all in Marrakech
column4: I came to the Movenpick Marrakech with a friend for a relaxing break and some winter sun along with a chance to get out into the city to enjoy a bit of the local culture. The location is perfect as it's within a short taxi ride of all the main sights and restaurants but still feels secluded enough from the hustle and bustle of the Medina and busier tourist spots. The rooms are fantastic and a generous size and there are a number of pools with many sunbeds should you wish to spend a day relaxing in the sun. The real star of the hotel is it's staff, however. Everyone is polite, courteous and more than willing to do whatever it takes to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. We would particularly like to thank Leila and Hanane who went over and above on several occasions to‚Ä¶

This is our second stay at the Movenpick (Marrakesh). It is a fantastic hotel, the staff are amazing (this was one of the reasons why we came back to the movenpick) kind, friendly, polite and extremely courteous. I had a few queries and Laila who's based at the reception dealt with them straight away, she was so professional and respectful. The whole ambience of the hotel is outstanding and the breakfast is amazing. For me the location is ideal (slightly away from the hustle and bustle). We will definitely be returning back to the Movenpick. Thank you to all the staff especially Laila.

Great hotel full of great staff (in particularly Laila from reception), who made our stay even better. Fantastic hotel with brilliant views and food. Will be coming back to Marrakech next year to stay here again

This has been by far my best stay. Upon arriving to Movernpick hotel we were greeted and approached by the bell boy Mad Aimed. He quickly and politely helped us with our 5 heavy suitcases which were in the room waiting for us after we checked in. A few hours after check in there was a minor sanitation issue with our room. Once we made the receptionist Nehzar aware she quickly accommodated us. She was understanding, respectful and kind to us. She reported the issue to the manager Hadid and he upgraded our normal room into a deluxe suite. Nehzar also gave us two free spa vouchers. Their care and problem solving was greatly appreciated. At the spa we were massaged by Naija and Imane. They are real professionals. I was comfortable, relaxed and soothed thanks to them. They were‚Ä¶

After an unfortunate start with the initial room we had been given, the hospitality we received from the movenpick, in particular Laila from the reception, to reprimand the situation was unbelievable. It is my second visit here and I will undoubtedly return for a third.

Huge hotel with large, beautiful grounds and very nice pool area. Several dining options. Lovely large room. Great breakfast buffet. Good location down the street from a major mall and not too far from the old medina. This was our second 5* hotel stay in this area of Marrakesh, and the Movenpick was definitely superior.

The breakfast here is fantastic, so many different options and great customer service. A big thank you to Fatima for her beautiful smile, pleasant manner, excellent customer service and of course the fabulous mint tea.

If you want to choose a hotel for your stay you can trust this hotel where you can experience a real five star hotel with a real five star Moroccan service. I move to this hotel after a bad experience with another hotel in Marrakech. A fancy lobby filled with the smell of flowers is ready to welcome you. Check in was so fast and easy. Breakfast was so tasty and covers all tastes. Room was so big and comfortable and was well designed.

column3: Hotel is quite new and well facilitated
column4: The Movenpick Hotel is located some 30 minutes walking distance from Jama El f‚Äôna Market & Souks to its west, or 10 minutes' walk to the very modern Menara Mall to its south. The area feels quite safe, even as we hiked back to hotel at night. The hotel itself is quite okay, with all the facilities you would expect from a 4 star hotel. The breakfast is well stocked with varieties and choices. The staff members are generally friendly.

column3: Huge hotel attached to convention center--great!
column4: Great hotel, beautiful corridors and rooms, lovely large outdoor pool. Breakfasts were terrific. Comfortable beds, nice bathroom and hot shower with lots of water, and the room was large. Service was good but not excellent--service sort of on Morocco time....

Great hotel, Rooms are nice and comfortable... breakfast is excellent. The food at the restaurant was excellent too. The staff are very nice and professional. Great pool facilities and friendly staff. Special thanks to Jihane, Othman and Anas. We will certainly stay again at the Movenpick during our next visit to Marrakech.

column3: Youssef‚Äôs customer service skills was amazing
column4: He was very attentive and catered to all our needs, he‚Äôs very easy to communicate with and helped with everything we needed and more! Thanks, this makes our stay at the M√∂venpick so much easier and helps us start our day amazingly! Also the breakfast is exceptional.

column3: A very good hotel in a quiet residential area.
